  이름: Shizuma Origasa
  특징: A former samurai of the Aizu Domain who embarks on a quest to locate his missing fiancée, Sumie Kanomata. He begins working as a rickshaw puller in Edo and then takes a position in the police force.
  성우: Yuuichi Nakamura

  특징: A fair-haired man always seen wearing a head and face covering who is in the opium export business. He is the overlord of the Moriya and Fujishima clans and their criminal enterprises.
  성우: Kazuhiro Yamaji

  이름: Ryuuzou Moriya
  특징: The scheming head of the Moriya Clan in business with Hiramatsu but also tries to cheat him. He employs Shuragami to do his dirty work which causes friction within his clan.
  성우: Katsuhisa Houki

  이름: Sumie Kanomata
  특징: She is the sister of Shuragami's best friend who asked him to look after her. The sole survivor of a massacre of women by the samurai Masaomi Kuramoto during the Boshin War, she resurfaced later as the geisha and assassin Hinazuru to take revenge on the Meiji government for its autrocities during the Boshin War.
  성우: Tomoyo Kurosawa

  이름: Senri Kurogi
  특징: She is a spy working for the British government and poses as the red-haired reporter, Mary Blackwood.

Anime 223:
ID: 171145
제목 (Romaji): Crayon Shin-chan: Ora-tachi no Kyouryuu Nikki
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): クレヨンしんちゃん オラたちの恐竜日記
줄거리: The 32nd Crayon Shin-chan film. The movie will follow the friendship between the Nobara family's pet dog Shiro and a "small dinosaur." Their connection helps the growth of Shinnosuke and the Kusakabe Defense Squad. 

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)
방영 시작일: 2024-8-9
방영 종료일: 2024-8-9
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: None분
장르: 코미디, 에치, 일상
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx171145-tvVUfRjbD4AZ.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WaOKAKYNwTk
-등장인물-
  이름: Shinnosuke Nohara
  특징: He is a kindergarten-aged boy whose antics are the basis for the series. His affectionate name is Shin-chan. He is 5 years old and loves Chocobis and an animated superhero named "Action Kamen". He is attracted to older girls and women, despite his young age. He brazenly pursues any girl who catches his eye. He shares this trait with his father and paternal grandfather, but this often results in Mom's cruel punishment. The only girl he seems to really like is a college student named Nanako. Some of his strange activities include dressing up and mooning. In general, he is brutally honest, highly curious, and has no shame whatsoever. Ironically, there have been several instances in which his antics actually solved the problems of those around him. He also displays a surprising amount of talent at various activities including kendo. On rare occasions, he displays bouts of selfless kindness (for example, in one anime episode he saved a frog from a truck on a rainy day, getting all wet and dirty and risking Misae's ire since it was his last set of clean clothes), but these are often immediately followed by antics that negate the goodwill others feel. There are also times when Shin Chan displays a level of maturity beyond his usual self in his concern for others. For example, during the trip to Australia where he bumps into Kazama, he kindheartedly arranged for Kazama's father to play ball with his son after Shin Chan notices him being sad on the beach.
  성우: 

  이름: Shiro
  특징: A white, fluffy puppy Shin-chan found in a cardboard box early in the series. While a beloved member of the family, he is the subject of neglect thanks to his owner's forgetfulness and short attention span. He is a very intelligent dog, often presenting logic and intellect that surpasses his human owners. As his meals from the Noharas are at best inconsistent, he has developed a talent for foraging. An oddly human-like dog, he is very responsible and painstakingly careful.  (Source: Wikipedia)
  성우: 

  이름: Misae Nohara
  특징: The mother of the Nohara family. She is 29 years old and a typical housewife of post-war Japan, she cleans, launders, cooks, sews, mothers, and lazes all to varying degrees of success. While at heart a caring and nurturing individual, her positive aspects are often offset by her many shortcomings. A paragon of hypocrisy, after handing out irrevocable edicts to her husband and children, she will not hesitate to immediately break them once they are out of sight. She administers brutal punishment to her husband, son, and on rare occasions her year-old daughter whenever they disobey her. While she spends as little as possible on the less-essential needs of her husband and son, she loves to splurge on Himawari and herself, though she is noted to have instances of great generosity. She is the source of boundless diet and savings plans, all of which fail within the first week. For example, she is prone to immediately partake in bargain sales when she sees them, thinking she is saving the family money. However, she buys in extreme quantities, which defeats the purpose. Additionally, she secretly hoardes money for her own personal use.  Source: Wikipedia
  성우: 

  이름: Masao Sato
  특징: Masao Sato is one of Shin-chan's friends. He is known to be a scaredy cat, and a bit of a cry baby. In the FUNimation dub, he is portrayed as having mildly effeminate/homosexual tendencies.
  성우: 

  이름: Nene Sakurada
  특징: Nene Sakurada is Shin-chan's female classmate and friend. She loves to play 'real omamagoto', or 'real house', in which divorces and arguments are very common. She occasionally sees her mother go crazy and shrieks something literally translated to be "You're not my usual mom!" She has the same character as her mother and she is often seen releasing her frustrations on a helpless stuffed bunny.
  성우: 


-제작진-
 - 감독: Shinobu Sasaki 

 - 각본: moral 


-제작사-: ADK Emotions, Futabasha, Shin-Ei Animation

Anime 224:
ID: 171291
제목 (Romaji): trapezium
제목 (English): Trapezium
제목 (원문): トラペジウム
줄거리: Driven by an unwavering passion for becoming an idol, Yuu Azuma, a young, ambitious first-year student at Joshuu East High School, embarks on a journey to form an idol group. To make her dream a reality, she recruits one girl from each of her region’s four high schools (located to the north, east, south and west) and soon finds her fellow group members.

Joining Yuu is Ranko Kashima, a sophisticated second-year student at Holy Teneritas Southern Girls’ Academy, with a distinctive curly hairstyle and admiration for Ochou-fujin ("Madame Butterfly"); Kurumi Taiga, a student at West Tech Vocational High School, who wears cute, oversized jackets with long sleeves and dreams of winning the championship at a robotics competition; and, Mika Kamei, a student who also hails from Joshuu North High School, is known for being a kind-hearted girl and for her dedication to volunteering.

With the help of Shinji Kudou, Yuu's "collaborator" and confidante, these four young girls set off on the road to stardom. But the journey hides unexpected trials, rigorous demands, setbacks and pressures, threatening to undo all that Yuu has worked so hard for.
(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

Anime 226:
ID: 171397
제목 (Romaji): NocturnaL
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): NocturnaL
줄거리: Episode 1 -  2 part 1 - Nocturnal
Sayoko Miyamura is an honor student, friendly and popular with her classmates. She is like a flower on a high peak that Etou has a secret crush on. While hanging out at night, Etou sees Sayoko Miyamura in a dispute with some guys. Etou was about to pass by, feigning indifference, but then he decided to intervene. The two hold hands and run away from the place. The impression he gets is somehow different from the one he saw at school during the daytime. Sayoko Miyamura, not her... she had a dual personality. Her personality "Yako" was created for Sayoko to be a good girl. She appears at night and is the complete opposite. She's rebellious, foul-mouthed, and sexually unrestrained.

Episode 2 part 2 - François
A "teacher'' who quit his job as a teacher is assigned to educate Yumeko Origasa, who has stopped attending school. During his time as a teacher, he was attracted to Yumeko's high-handedness, her strangely mature sex appeal, and the way she always looked out the window, not fitting in with her surroundings. However, when he could no longer control his own perverted sexuality, the "teacher" was driven by remorse and resigned from his position. He becomes an obedient dog to Yumeko, who plays with his twisted sexuality, and vows to obey her.

(Source: Mediabank, translated)

Anime 231:
ID: 171637
제목 (Romaji): Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan - Kyoto Douran
제목 (English): Rurouni Kenshin -Kyoto Disturbance-
제목 (원문): るろうに剣心 －明治剣客浪漫譚－京都動乱
줄거리: The second season of Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan (2023). 

A phantom of the Bakumatsu who must be taken down. All the answers you desire are in Kyoto!

(Source: Aniplex USA)
방영 시작일: 2024-10-4
방영 종료일: None-None-None
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 23화
러닝타임: 23분
장르: 액션, 모험, 드라마, 로맨스
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영중
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/b171637-h17RbEFtR0rQ.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VMOnLtMcSE
-등장인물-
  이름: Kaoru Kamiya
  특징: __Height:__ 155cm 
__Affiliations:__ Kamiya dojo

The primary instructor of the Kamiya Kasshin-Ryū fighting style developed by her late father, Kamiya Koshijirō, Kaoru inherited a small dojo from her father after he was killed during the Seinan War and operates it by herself. Naturally, she is independent, possessive, compassionate, courageous, feisty, strong-willed, and a great fighter to boot- with only the occasional mood swing. Kaoru is also known for her cooking disliked by her friends and family and her ability to see the good in others.
  성우: Rie Takahashi

  이름: Sanosuke Sagara
  특징: Sagara Sanosuke left home at an early age to join the Sekihō Army (Sekihō-tai), leaving behind his father (Kamishimoemon), his mother (Naname), and his younger sister (Uki) who adored him. He would return home years later to discover that his mother was dead, having died a couple of years after the birth of his younger brother, Ota, who immediately began to admire Sanosuke for his bravery and boldness. Sanosuke would also find out that his family name was now Higashidani, although he would never use it himself. His sister, after Sanosuke's disappearance and then her mother's death, became overprotective of her younger brother and father, who worked as a local merchant and farmer with the infamy of being a local fighter. Ota, after Sanosuke leaves his family again, would eventually follow his brother's advice and train at the Kamiya Kasshin-Ryū style dojo to become strong. The Sekihoutai fought for the imperial alliance at the end of the Tokugawa regime and Sanosuke admired his captain, Sagara Sōzō and took the family name Sagara from him. The Sekihō Army were on assignment to spread word of the halving of taxes proclaimed by the revolution. However, when the revolutionary government encountered financial problems, they labeled the Sekihoutai as frauds to bury their promises. This setup was engineered by Shindō Tatewaki, a former officer in the imperial alliance. The Sekihoutai were designated scapegoats and to be executed; Sanosuke was the only survivor, other than his friend Tsukioka Katsuhiro. The exact circumstances of Sōzō's death differ between the animated version and the manga; in the manga Sanosuke realized he had been killed after seeing his decapitated head on display as a warning, while in the anime a wounded Sōzō pushed Sanosuke to safety off a cliff in order to save him before dying himself. Full of anger and bitterness, Sanosuke made a living as a fighter-for-hire who bore the nickname "Zanza" derived from his weapon, the zanbatō. Sanosuke's sword, the heaviest katana ever made in the Rurouni Kenshin universe, originates from the Ōnin Struggle. Due to wear the blade no longer has an edge. Sanosuke uses the sword to smash and crush. Hiruma Kihei and Gohei hire Sanosuke to kill Himura Kenshin, but after the former assassin defeats Sanosuke and Sanosuke learns of the truth of Kenshin's no-kill approach, Sanosuke becomes a valuable ally. He later adopts a boxing-like fighting skill, known for the strength of his right fist. Because the zanbatō broke during the fight, Sanosuke no longer wields it on a regular basis, using only one more time in the manga to defend the Kamiya dojo during the Jinchu arc. At the end of the manga series, Sanosuke leaves Japan to avoid becoming wrongfully arrested and travels the world. He is not heard from until five years later during a reunion of the Kenshin-gumi, in which he tells them via a letter that he is in Mongolia and will stay there for a while before heading back to Japan. 

(Source: Wikipedia)
  성우: Taku Yashiro

  이름: Kenshin Himura
  특징: __Height:__ 158cm  

Kenshin Himura, also known throughout the anime as Hitokiri Battousai (Battousai the Manslayer) or Himura the Battousai, is the main character of the series Rurouni Kenshin. His original name was Shinta (心太). 

His parents died of cholera when he was very young and as a result, was adopted by three slave women in a traveling slave wagon. Soon after meeting them, bandits had raided the convoy and killed his three new guardians and where about to kill him when Seijuro Hiko killed the bandits. Hiko soon adopted the child and because Shinta was not a name fitted for a swordman, he renamed him Kenshin, meaning "Heart of Sword," took him under his wing and taught him the Hiten Mitsuruugi Ryu.   

~! However, before full completion of the sword style could be passed on to Kenshin, the Japanese Revolution had been happening at the time and right before Kenshin's eyes.  Because of his kind nature and seeing people suffering, he knew he needed to do something about it.  He left in the middle of his training and without his master's blessing and joined the Imperialists.  It was during the Revolution where Kenshin met Tomoe, his first love and wife. During the revolution, Kenshin was given the nickname of Hitokiri Battousai because of his god-like speed of drawing a sword to kill the enemy instantly. After helping the Imperialist to a position where they would undoubtedly win the revolution, Kenshin left the revolution all-together with a vow to never kill again and the reverse-blade sword handed to him by Shakku-dono. It was Tomoe's death by his hands that pushed him over the edge of never to kill again.!~

The next time we see Kenshin is 10 years later as he has become a wanderer who helps out anyone in need who is suffering right before his eyes. Those long 10 years have taken him from Kyoto, all over Japan to where we find him in episode one of the anime, in Tokyo, still keeping his vow never to kill again. It is here where he meets Kaoru Kamiya and his whole life begins to change once again.

Kenshin is usually depicted as a care-free swordsman who is very aloof and tends to be a bit simple-minded when it comes to living normally. He is seen to be doing many of the chores around the dojo that he stays at with Kaoru, (i.e., cooking, cleaning, laundry, etc.). He believes it is his way of repaying Kaoru with allowing him to stay at her dojo. (although it seems he has gotten attracted to kaoru in the end). However, his swordsmanship ranks among the elite as he is seen defeating every rival (with the exception of Hajime Saitou which ended in a draw). His battle senses are top-notch and he recognizes even the slightest of advantages, strategies and tactics during a sword battle.    

(Source: kenshin.wikia.com)
  성우: Souma Saitou

  이름: Makoto Shishio
  특징: After the death of Yukishiro Tomoe, Himura Kenshin became a free wielding swordsman to protect members of the Ishin Shishi. Shishio Makoto became his successor as the shadow hitokiri (assassin) and was responsible for the assassination of Izuka, the man who had betrayed the shishi.  

The future Meiji government was more secretive about Shishio than Kenshin; many members of the Chōshū and Satsuma clans (the members of the future Meiji government) would have very little information on him.  Later, the new Meiji government believed it would be in their best interests to eliminate Shishio before he became too powerful since Shishio was a man who desired power. Thus during the Boshin War, Shishio was rendered unconscious by several gunshots, doused in oil and burned alive by the new government formed by the Ishin Shishi. He survived, sustaining severe damage to his entire body. Afterwards, he assembled a group of the best fighters in Japan, called the Juppongatana (Ten Swords), to overthrow the Meiji government.  

Shishio envisioned a Japan ruled by him, enforcing the principles of natural selection, or what he called &quot;the strong eat the weak&quot;. Using this belief he ran a campaign against the Meiji government, as he felt it was too weak to effectively lead the country. Using his motto, he molded an ideological disciple out of Seta Sōjirō, who served as his right-hand man, and the strongest of the Juppongatana. He planned to strengthen the economy with petroleum once he took over the country.
  성우: Makoto Furukawa

  이름: Soujirou Seta
  특징: __PERSONALITY:__  Seta Soujiro is Shishio Makoto's right-hand man, a teenage assassin trained by Shishio himself. Soujiro is known for his lack of kenki or, simply, emotion. He possesses no anger and cites no fear in his enemies, other than with his sword. Soujiro is often seen smiling and has polite manners, always referring to others with Japanese suffixes. He is sarcastic, hiding his true emotions behind his smiling face. He however does have a special relationship with Yumi, she being a sister figure towards him. Soujiro usually dresses up in a blue kimono with white handguards.
__BACKGROUND:__~!Soujiro's constantly smiling face and polite manners stem from his tragic past. Born in Kanagawa Prefecture during the first year of Bunkyū (1861), Soujiro is an illegitimate child. Sōujiro's father left him in the care of his family, who badly mistreated him. He is assigned chores such as carrying rice to and from the family warehouse, and whenever he faltered, he was beaten by his family. Soujiro built a defense against their lashings; he put on a smiling face and endured the torture until they got tired of beating him and left him alone.  One night, he meets Shishio, who was on the run from the police. Soujiro witnesses Shishio kill some police officers and Shishio is about to kill him for it until he notices Soujiro smiling and therefore spares him in exchange for food and bandages. Shishio tells Soujiro that only the strong may live and that his predicament is his own fault for being weak. This new mentality, and a sword given to him by Shishio, determine his defense when his family finds him housing Shishio. Sojiro quickly finds himself cornered by them, attempting to murder him and blame his death on Shishio, and lashes out, killing every one of them at the age of eight.!~  
__TECHNIQUES:__ ~! Soujiro''s apparent lack of emotion, his simple, insensitive mentality that the strong will live and the weak shall die, and his skills make him a formidable foe for Kenshin. As a master swordsman of his own style, Soujirou's abilities have earned him the nickname of "Heaven's Sword" (天剣, Tenken?, Ten meaning Heaven and Ken meaning Sword, "Tenken" means swordsmanship of natural endowments). His shukuchi utilizes such powerful speed that, to an observer, it appears that the distance between the two fighters has shrunk (hence the name shukuchi, which means "reduced earth").  During his fight with Kenshin, Soujiro continually states he's only moving "three steps below shukuchi" or "two steps below shukuchi." While moving at the speed his shukuchi utilizes, the only thing that can be seen is Soujiro's footsteps ripping through the tatami mats. During "one step below shukuchi", he is able to attack from an omnidirectional angle, utilizing not only horizontal but vertical space.[5] While performing true shukuchi, he completely disappears and cannot be seen, even by Kenshin. Soujirou can dodge the Kuzu-ryūsen (九頭龍閃?, lit. "Nine-headed Dragon Flash"),[6] a move which apparently cannot be evaded even by Kenshin himself. Soujirou is also the first one ever to slash Kenshin in the back in the series.  Soujiro is also well versed in the Battōjutsu style like Kenshin, as is evident when he decides to use a stance similar to Kenshin's and when he destroys Kenshin's first sakabatō. Combining the true speed of shukuchi with the Battōjutsu, he has created his only named technique, Shuntensatsu (瞬天殺?, lit. "Instant Heaven Kill"), meaning "immediate killing by heaven's sword". It is named this because the speed behind the attack is so swift that the opponent dies instantly before falling to the floor.!~
  성우: Daiki Yamashita


-제작진-
 - 캐릭터 디자인: Terumi Nishii 

 - 감독: Yuki Komada 

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Kazuo Watanabe 

 - 각본: Hideyuki Kurata 

 - 음악: Yuu Takami 


-제작사-: Aniplex, LIDENFILMS, Shueisha

  이름: Gentleman
  특징: __Height:__ 177cm
~!
__Birthday:__ Jul 4
__Initial Age:__ 13
__Gender:__ Female
__Blood Type:__ AB
__Height:__ 149cm!~

A mysterious person who always acts from the shadows through a digital avatar. They are a 1st year student at Shadowverse Battle College, although they take classes remotely. They were also the leader of Sixth Magic. However, due to everyone rejecting their advice due to their controlling personality, they appointed [Shinobu Miki](https://anilist.co/character/288426/) to act on their behalf in the club, following instructions through an earphone.

~!
Upon going to Nekome's arcade center, their true identity as Shion Otosaka is discovered by [Ren Kazamatsuri](https://anilist.co/character/288424/) and [Tsubasa Takanashi](https://anilist.co/character/288425/). Tsubasa challenges them to a battle and they accept, asking her to keep their identity secret if they win. Despite winning, Tsubasa decides to keep their secret, having formed a bond with Shion, who starts to see that they are not as alone as they thought.

Shion is a solitary and reclusive person, always avoiding any human contact and preferring to interact with their avatar. They really like rabbits, video games and chess.

By showing themself as Gentleman, they prove to be an eccentric and spontaneous person, and somewhat arrogant and short tempered. They have great knowledge about Shadowverse and sincerely seek to share it, but they have trouble connecting with others due to being overly controlling, which leads to their reclusion. They are also quite unscrupulous, spying and hacking others without remorse.!~

Anime 237:
ID: 172190
제목 (Romaji): Kimi wa Meido-sama.
제목 (English): You are Ms. Servant
제목 (원문): 君は冥土様。
줄거리: This is the story of a maid who is all alone in the world, but who finally finds a family.

Told from young that her only worth is as a killer, Yuki had known nothing else except cold efficiency and following orders. Now that she has a chance to leave her past behind, she arrives at the doorstep of Hitoyoshi Yokoya, asking to be employed… as a maid?! Thus begins the journey of a former assassin learning what it means to be ‘normal’!

(Source: Shogakukan)
방영 시작일: 2024-10-6
방영 종료일: 2024-12-22
방영 요일: 일요일
화수: 12화
러닝타임: 23분
장르: 코미디, 로맨스, 일상
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영중
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx172190-i1IqizIUcKkN.jpg

Anime 239:
ID: 172218
제목 (Romaji): Yumemiru Otome
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 夢見ル乙女
줄거리: Manaka is in love with the handsome teacher Tonami, whom she admires, and Mizuki gently watches over her younger sister. The sisters thought that their sweet and bitter youth would continue like this, but...? When Manaka confesses to Tonami that she will do anything for him and wants to go out with him, everything changes! In exchange for going out with him, Manaka is at Tonami's mercy, and one day she is surrounded by strange men who are Tonami's "friends". The men who surround the frightened Manaka make her immerse herself in hellish pleasure...?

(Source: Lune-soft, translated)

Anime 240:
ID: 172242
제목 (Romaji): NIJIYON ANIMATION 2
제목 (English): NIJIYON ANIMATION 2
제목 (원문): にじよん あにめーしょん2
줄거리: The second season of NIJIYON ANIMATION.
방영 시작일: 2024-4-5
방영 종료일: 2024-6-21
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 12화
러닝타임: 4분
장르: 코미디, 음악, 일상
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx172242-1VjrQuON0Zfu.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IfVoRXUfiAU
-등장인물-
  이름: Yuu Takasaki
  특징: __Height:__ 156 cm (5'1")

Yuu Takasaki is the primary protagonist in Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club and one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is the manager, songwriter, and founder of Nijigaku. She is a second year student and her image color is black. 

Yuu is the budding school idol enthusiast of Nijigasaki High School, and is often seen with her characteristic thigh-high socks and twin-tails tips dyed green. She is Ayumu Uehara's inseparable childhood friend, having grown up as neighbors in the same apartment building near Odaiba.
  성우: Hinaki Yano

  이름: Ayumu Uehara
  특징: __Height:__ 159 cm (5'2")

Ayumu Uehara is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a member of A・ZU・NA, a unit under Nijigaku. She is a second year student and her image color is light pink. 

She is hard working and believes that trying your best is the only thing to do. She is kind, sociable and wants everyone to succeed. Ayumu can also be rather clumsy at times.
  성우: Aguri Onishi

  이름: Lanzhu Zhong
  특징: __Height:__ 165 cm (5'5")

Lanzhu Zhong is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a member of R3BIRTH, a unit under Nijigaku. She is a second year student and her image color is rose gold. She recently transferred from Hong Kong and is fluent in both Mandarin and Cantonese.

Despite showing herself as a charismatic girl, her unique personality tends to catch others off guard by how demanding she can be with them so that they achieve excellent results like her, which leads her to make questionable decisions and to treat people in a way that usually makes them feel insulted. Even so, she doesn't hesitate to seek every possible way to befriend others.
  성우: Akina Homoto

  이름: Kanata Konoe
  특징: __Height:__ 158 cm (5'2")

Kanata Konoe is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She was a member of the original group and is a member of QU4RTZ, a unit under Nijigaku. She is a third year student and her image color is violet. 

Kanata is always giving everything her all... even if it doesn't seem that way when she dozes off in the middle of conversations. She cares deeply for her little sister Haruka and will find a bottomless well of energy in matters relating to her. An ideal performance, for Kanata, is a stage in which she sleeps and her fans watch. She also has an aptitude for cooking and home economics. While she loves to be doted on and spoiled, she also looks after everyone in the club as a big sister figure.
  성우: Akari Kitou

  이름: Emma Verde
  특징: __Height:__ 166 cm (5'5")

Emma Verde is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She was a member of the original group and is a member of QU4RTZ, a unit under Nijigaku. She is a third year student and her image color is light green. 

Emma is from Switzerland and has eight younger siblings. She formerly attended the Y.G. International Academy. Emma sometimes speaks in simple Italian, implying she is from an Italian-speaking part of Switzerland. While she sometimes struggles to adapt to Japanese culture, Emma is a kind and pure-hearted third year who acts as a big sister towards the rest of the group who always provides a shoulder to lean on in times of need.
  성우: Maria Sashide


-제작진-
 - 감독: Yuuya Horiuchi 


-제작사-: Sunrise, Bandai Namco Filmworks, Bandai Namco Music Live

Anime 242:
ID: 172395
제목 (Romaji): Shinkalion: Change the World
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): シンカリオン チェンジ ザ ワールド
줄거리: "Unknown" is a mysterious enemy that suddenly appeared a long time ago. As a countermeasure, the "Evolutionary Railway Development Agency" (ERDA) has developed the "Shinkalion" robot that transform into bullet trains, to prepare for the threat.

"I want to be a cool person who can protect something..." Taisei Oonari, a second-year junior high school student, transfers to Shinkai Gakuen Middle School in search of clues about his older sister who disappeared two years ago.

Just then, the Unknown appears for the first time in 10 years. Taisei happens to have a high aptitude value as a Shinkalion pilot, and is forced to make a decision to fight it. What is the true nature of the Unknown and what is its purpose? What is the truth that comes to light at the end of the fight? The story of the boys' determination and growth begins now.
(Source: Official Website, translated) 
Note: Relations are provisional and will be updated when more info is announced.
방영 시작일: 2024-4-7
방영 종료일: None-None-None
방영 요일: 일요일
화수: None화
러닝타임: 24분
장르: 메카, SF
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영중
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx172395-TESU4M0kQ94c.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZeHswCdCsAw
-등장인물-
  이름: Taisei Oonari
  특징: __Height:__ 162 cm
__Birthplace:__ Saitama Prefecture
__Hobby:__ Transfer Guide

He is a second-year junior high school student and the driver of Shinkalion E5 Hayabusa. He is serious and kind-hearted, but also shy and pushy. Influenced by his older sister, he is addicted to railways and is building his ideal stations and railway lines in the Metaverse.
  성우: Hiiro Ishibashi, Chiyuki  Miura

  이름: Akane Folden
  특징: __Height:__ 172 cm
__Birthplace:__ Tokyo

He is a second-year junior high school student and drives the Shinkalion E6 Komachi. He is a cool & confident person with a French father & Japanese mother. Born into a family of athletes, he had a promising future as a track and field athlete, but an injury has kept him away from track and field at present. He likes track & field and reading.
  성우: Kenshou Ono

  이름: Ryouta Kuzuryu
  특징: __Height:__ 165 cm
__Birthplace:__ Fukui Prefecture

A second-year junior high school student and drives the Shinkalion E7 Kagayaki. Although he has a playful personality, he is a caring person and becomes Taisei's first friend when he first moved in. Having been saved by Shinkalion when he was young, he has a deep admiration for Shinkalion. He likes playing games and cooking.
  성우: Shinba Tsuchiya, Arisa Sekine

  이름: Vina
  특징: 
  성우: Hana Tamegai

  이름: Mai Oume
  특징: __Height:__ 155 cm
__Birthplace:__ Saitama Prefecture

Mai is generally a stark contrast to Taisei, being not only able to speak her mind, but initiate her goals and get her point across without freezing. She is also a very kind-hearted girl, and is more than willing to help Taisei in his endeavors despite problems. She also likes Karaoke.
  성우: Kaede Hondo


-제작진-

Anime 245:
ID: 172416
제목 (Romaji): Mob kara Hajimaru Tansaku Eiyuutan
제목 (English): A Nobody's Way Up to an Exploration Hero
제목 (원문): モブから始まる探索英雄譚
줄거리: Kaito Takagi is a low status high schooler. A background mob character, you might say. He is just a low-level explorer who hunts slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared all around Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, it drops an extremely rare item, worth hundreds of millions, a card that can summon mythical beings!! After he decides to activate the summon, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears.

Rise above the mob, Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

(Source: Hobby Japan, translated)
방영 시작일: 2024-7-6

-등장인물-
  이름: Manhattan Cafe
  특징: A mysterious, shadowy girl. She can see things that people can't see, draw strange patterns with her fingertips, and is always alone by the wall. But according to her, she is never alone. She is always with her "friends". She likes coffee, but drinks it slowly because drinking it all at once makes her sick to her stomach.

(Source: Official site, Uma Musume Wiki)
  성우: Yui Ogura

  이름: Agnes Tachyon
  특징: A super genius horse girl who’s one of the smartest horse girls of her time. Because of her great intellect, she’s never had to reveal her maximum ability. Thus her true skills are still unknown. Her personality is logical, intelligent, and eccentric. She’s not at all malicious, and in fact has a jovial, playful disposition. She has an Ultimate Super Ultra Sweet Tooth. She’s constantly eating sugar to keep her grey matter full of energy.
  성우: Sumire Uesaka

  이름: Jungle Pocket
  특징: Jungle Pocket  is charismatic and energetic person. She led a group of ruffians in the world of freestyle races. 


She adores [Fuji Kiseki](https://anilist.co/character/140847/Fuji-Kiseki), her senior.
  성우: Yuri Fujimoto

  이름: Dantsu Flame
  특징: 
  성우: Haruna Fukushima

  이름: Fuji Kiseki
  특징: __Team:__ Rigil

A horse girl who is responsible and caring, and is loved by everyone. She trusts [Tanabe](https://anilist.co/character/330959/Tanabe-Trainer)'s skills as a trainer more than anyone else.
  성우: Eriko Matsui

Anime 249:
ID: 172965
제목 (Romaji): Sore Ike! Anpanman: Baikinman to Ehon no Lulun
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): それいけ！アンパンマン　ばいきんまんとえほんのルルン
줄거리: The film's story centers on Anpanman's nemesis Baikinman, but this time, he attempts to become a warrior of love and courage when he is sucked into a picture book. Inside the book is a large forest where fairies live. Baikinman meets the fairy Lulun, who asks him to defeat an elephant that is rampaging in the forest. Although Baikinman is reluctant, he tries his best to defeat the elephant. However, it is too strong for Baikinman, so he tells Lulun to call Anpanman to help protect the picture book world.
(Source: Anime News Network)
방영 시작일: 2024-6-28
방영 종료일: 2024-6-28
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: 64분
장르: 코미디, 판타지
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx172965-DP0UGsCWM7W0.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zjj9awIwm5Q
-등장인물-
  이름: Currypanman
  특징: Another of Anpanman&#039;s friends. His head is made from Curry (curry filled bread in Japanese anime). He is quick tempered and hot-headed on the surface, but gives way to a kind and sentimental interior. He likes hot food and dislikes sweet food. Tends to be the strongman of the trio. Wields the Curry-punch and Curry-kick, which are similar to Anpanman&#039;s fighting techniques. He can also use the hot curry concealed in his head as a weapon, using it to burn the bad guys&#039; eyes.
  성우: Michiyo Yanagisawa

  이름: Horrorman
  특징: A skeleton villain who often works with Baikinman and Dokin-chan. Although he seems scary on the outside, he is very weak and often falls to pieces. His special attack is the Bone Boomerang, where he takes off one of his bones and throws it. He is also in love with Dokin-chan and often stalks her. He often says &quot;Hora&quot; in most of his sentences.
  성우: Kazuki Yao

  이름: Dokin-chan
  특징: Baikinman&#039;s female partner in crime. She is selfish, demanding, childish, and greedy, but sometimes shows kindness. She has a crush on Shokupanman. Her Japanese name is a combination of &quot;Doki&quot;, the Japanese onomatopoeia for a quickly beating heart, &quot;baikin&quot; (meaning &quot;germ&quot;), and the diminutive/affectionate suffix &quot;-chan&quot;.
  성우: Miina Tominaga

  이름: Baikinman
  특징: Anpanmans rival. The villain from &quot;Germ World&quot; is the leader of the Viruses. His Japanese name means &quot;Germ Man&quot;. His ambition is to destroy Anpanman and turn the planet into another &quot;Germ World&quot;, yet he is perfectly content to play tricks, steal, and bully those weaker than him. He and Anpanman were born at the same time, making them physical representations of moral dualism. He has a weakness to soap, which shrinks him to the size of a fly. He constructs machines and thinks of intricate plans to counteract Anpanman&#039;s strength. Baikinman is the model for Team Rocket at Pokemon.
  성우: Ryuusei Nakao

  이름: Shokupanman
  특징: A friend of Anpanman. His head is made from sliced white bread (Japanese: shoku pan). He is handsome and level-headed and kind, but narcissistic. Tends to be the thinker of the trio. His job when not helping Anpanman is serving lunch to the schoolchildren. Dokin-chan has a crush on him. Wields the Shoku-punch and Shoku-kick, which are similar to Anpanman&#039;s fighting techniques. He also has a multi-functional delivery van known as the Shokupanman-go with many implements to help avoid trouble.
  성우: Sumi Shimamoto


-제작진-
 - 음악: Takao Imaizumi 

 - 음악: Hiroaki Kondou 

 - 각본: Shouji Yonemura 

 - 감독: Jun Kawagoe 

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Minoru Maeda 


-제작사-: TMS Entertainment

Anime 252:
ID: 173174
제목 (Romaji): BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!: Haru no Hidamari, Mayoi Neko
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! 春の陽だまり、迷い猫
줄거리: Compilation film of BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!. The first of the Bandori MyGO compilation movie duology.
방영 시작일: 2024-9-27
방영 종료일: 2024-9-27
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: None분
장르: 드라마, 음악
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx173174-PhUFHaaVnvgv.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XSt7J-t-kk8
-등장인물-
  이름: Anon Chihaya
  특징: __Height:__ 160 cm

Anon Chihaya is a first-year student at Haneoka Girls' High School and the rhythm guitarist of [MyGO!!!!!](https://anilist.co/staff/292754/).

Anon is an honor student who is very social and also assertive at the same time. Despite this, it is shown that she has had a hard time making friends. Anon also loves following and trying out the newest trends. She approaches Tomori after learning about her in hopes of creating a band together with her. Although she initially created the band in order to gain attention, to the point where she wanted to name the band after herself, she ends up becoming dedicated to her band activities and taking practicing seriously.

(Source: BanG Dream Wikia)
  성우: Rin Tateishi

  이름: Tomori Takamatsu
  특징: **Height:** 155 cm

Tomori Takamatsu is a first-year student at Haneoka Girls' High School and the vocalist and lyricist of **[MyGO!!!!!](https://anilist.co/staff/292754/MyGO)**.

Tomori is a kind but sensitive girl who has an awkward personality. She has a tendency to stutter while talking and not make eye contact. She also tends to blame herself for the conflicts that happen around her, even if they weren't caused by her.

She is infamously known as "Haneoka's Weirdo Girl" due to her peculiar personality. She likes collecting all sorts of things, such as band-aids (especially ones with animals such as pandas or penguins on them), slippery things, just-the-right-size things, and even rocks and fallen leaves that she picks up from the ground. She also likes pill bugs and has been shown often drawing them in her notebooks.

(Source: BanG Dream Wikia)
  성우: Hina Youmiya

  이름: Taki Shiina
  특징: **Height:** 156 cm

Taki Shiina is a first-year student at Hanasakigawa Girls' High School and the drummer and composer of **[MyGO!!!!!](https://anilist.co/staff/292754/MyGO)**.

Taki is a loner who enjoys being all alone. She works part-time at RiNG, but due to her blunt personality, short temper and the fact she has a tendency to glare at people, she isn't good at customer service. She is a bit of a perfectionist, but at the same time has an inferiority complex towards her older sister.
  성우: Coco Hayashi

  이름: Raana Kaname
  특징: __Height:__ 150 cm

Raana Kaname is a third-year student at Hanasakigawa Girls' Junior High School and the lead guitarist of [MyGO!!!!!](https://anilist.co/staff/292754/MyGO)

Raana is an eccentric girl. She is a very talented guitarist who also has a very frank personality, as she always states what she likes and doesn't like. She is somewhat of a glutton and loves sweets, especially parfaits, but also dislikes hot foods as she has a sensitive tongue.
  성우: Hina Aoki

  이름: Soyo Nagasaki
  특징: **Height:** 162 cm

**Soyo Nagasaki** is a first-year student at Tsukinomori Girls' Academy and the bassist of **[MyGO!!!!!](https://anilist.co/staff/292754/MyGO)**

Soyo is a very kind and mature girl and she is often compared to an older sister. Due to this, she is often relied on by her peers. She has a habit of fiddling with her fingertips when she's thinking or planning something. Although not outwardly hostile, Soyo can be quite cunning at times.
  성우: Mika Kohinata


-제작진-
 - 감독: Koudai Kakimoto 

 - 음악: Hitoshi Fujima 

 - 음악: Junpei Fujita 


-제작사-: SANZIGEN

Anime 257:
ID: 173263
제목 (Romaji): Touhai: Ura Rate Mahjong Touhai Roku
제목 (English): None

줄거리: Money, women, organs. Kei, a high school boy, frequents the underground mahjong parlor teeming with desires, earning him the moniker 'K of Ice' in the underworld due to his cold-hearted strategy and stylish gameplay. Rumors also circulate that he keeps a girl at his home.
(Source: Pony Canyon)

-등장인물-
  이름: Kei
  특징: A high school mahjong player who makes a living as a pinch hitter in addition to his studies. He has an extraordinary memory and is good at theoretical thinking.
  성우: Kousuke Tanabe

Anime 259:
ID: 173313
제목 (Romaji): Atashin'chi NEXT
제목 (English): Atashin'chi NEXT
제목 (원문): あたしンちNEXT
줄거리: New Atashin'chi anime to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the manga.
방영 시작일: 2024-6-5
방영 종료일: 2024-10-5
방영 요일: 수요일
화수: 5화
러닝타임: 10분
장르: 코미디
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx173313-DirbTHTioULL.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6O3dfDSHmA
-등장인물-
  이름: Mikan Tachibana
  특징: A 17-year old high school student, and is the intended &quot;main protagonist&quot; of the series. (The &quot;atashi&quot; (me) in the title.) She goes to school in a public high school, which unfortunately is a long, stressful commute away. She is portrayed as an easy-going, relaxed girl who likes to have fun. Often very maiden-like, but other times very tomboyish, she goes through every day with some funny thing happening.  Her best friends in high school consist of the &quot;adult&quot;-like Shimi-chan (her last name Shimizu), who always stays calm and collected, and always has good advice from diets to dealing with parents; and Yukarin (her first name Yuka), who loves karaoke and introduces Mikan to the &quot;cuter&quot; things in life.  Mikan has a crush on the bishōnen-type Iwaki. Although she wants to confess her feelings to him, she is often foiled by his best friend, Yoshioka, whose wisecracks get under Mikan&#039;s skin.  What&#039;s worse is that Mikan and Yoshioka have attended the same academies since Elementary School, and people (including her own Mother) persuade her to date Yoshioka. At times, when she looks in the direction of Iwaki and Yoshioka, Shimi-chan gets the wrong idea and assumes Mikan is staring at Yoshioka, not Iwaki.  She &quot;gets-by&quot; in school, is horrible at taking notes, and is a heavy sleeper, which unfortunately makes her late to school. She also has a habit of falling asleep through homework assignments, causing her to have no choice but to submit incomplete assignments.  Her interests include karaoke, eating sweets (although she dislikes chocolate cake), and admiring/creating teddy bears.  She is part of her high school&#039;s &quot;Bear Brigade&quot; (composed of the wealthy, fashionable Rio; the geeky-yet-romantically-involved Nitta; and best friends Kajii and Asada), who create original teddy bears, perform teddy bear acts, and admire expensive teddy bear toys.  Her goal in life is to become a famous teddy bear and/or fashion designer. According to her mother, she taught herself how to sew on buttons (through observation) at the age of 3. She once fancied being a breadmaker, but lost interest soon after.  She is often bogged down by her Mother&#039;s rules, which inhibit her allowance, her fashions, her curfew, and mostly&mdash;her simple boxed lunches. She is frustrated that her Mother lets her younger brother get away with some rules, however, she often (and cleverly) makes her case.
  성우: Fumiko Orikasa

  이름: Midori Imaji
  특징: A modern-day Japanese housewife, who prides herself on a clean home, a balanced budget, and a frugal yet &quot;tasty&quot; dinner. Although at times she finds nifty tricks to multitask and consolidate household chores (like vacuuming the rug and waxing the wooden floor all at once), she is awfully clumsy and gets herself into sticky situations from losing control. Despite her hard work, she is also known for being somewhat lazy by taking copious afternoon naps, watching TV while eating senbei, and skimping out on shopping and/or cooking on rainy days.  She often steps out on shopping trips and afternoon teas with her good friends Mrs. Mizushima and Mrs. Toyama. Additionally, they often take part in activities with (the more affluent) Mrs. Misumi. They often envy Mrs. Misumi&#039;s &quot;rich&quot; lifestyle and try to find &quot;affordable ways&quot; to be more stylish and upbeat.  Her hobbies include shodou and cooking and eating chikuwa.  She was also born in Ōita Prefecture. Her childhood name was &quot;Banban&quot;. Although she had a childhood friend (that she liked a lot and hoped to marry), she was placed into an Omiai arranged marriage and married Father.  She is also a very strict mother to her two children, and tries to have them waste less money/electricity/food, etc. Although she tries to make herself look more upbeat, she is very traditional in thinking when it comes to her daughter Mikan. (She won&#039;t allow pierced ears, staying out late for Karaoke, excessive fashions, and values housework over homework.) She is sweet on her younger son, however, and often lets him slide with things Mikan can&#039;t get away with.
  성우: Kumiko Watanabe

  이름: Yuzuhiko Tachibana
  특징: A second-year junior high school student who is very studious and forward-thinking. He is innovative and his brain far exceeds his age. He tends to find solutions to the family&#039;s (common) mishaps. Yuzuhiko is far more intelligent than Mikan.  He enjoys playing video games and listening to music. His secret pastime is admiring the fictional idol Marumi Maruno. He collects photos, magazines, and keepsakes related to her. However, he keeps this secret from his family (in fear of ridicule) and his friends (since they prefer other idols aside from Maruno).  He has a love for Mayonnaise, and is very picky about which brand his pennypinching mother buys.  Although he reveres in the fact that his Mother is sweet on him, he hates all the attention she gives him. He prefers to be treated more as an adult, and to not be called &quot;Yuu-chan&quot; anymore.  At school, he does well and gets very good marks, but is often intimidated by his teacher, Miss Hara.  He also has many friends, and is seen as one of the more popular students.  His best friend is Fujino, who shares his interests in books, music, and games. However, Fujino is seen as more of a boke to Yuzuhiko&#039;s tsukkomi, by acting very immature and childish. Fujino has a crush on Mikan, which disturbs Yuzuhiko. (He even goes as far as to tell Fujino about Mikan&#039;s &quot;disgusting&quot; traits, only to get caught and scolded loudly by Mikan.) His other friends include the timid Nasuo Arai, who at one point shared his love for Marumi Maruno, but then changed his mind; the popular girl Sudou, who makes friends with everyone; and the &quot;unique&quot; Yuri Ishida, whose appearance and weird quirks seem to repel the other classmates, yet attract the attention of Yuzuhiko, Fujino, and Sudou.  He also has a &quot;Fan Club&quot;, which was founded by Sayu Kawashima, who has a strong crush on Yuzuhiko. She comes up with many ways to convey her feelings to him, but those plans always get foiled, often by Yuri Ishida. He considers Ishida to be her &quot;rival&quot;, even though Ishida shows no interest in Yuzuhiko. At times, she gets into situations where Yuzuhiko &quot;saves&quot; her (by catching her when she falls, or bumps into him), which result in a lovestruck scurry. The other member of the &quot;Fan Club&quot; is her best friend, Yamashita. Yamashita is often the voice of reason or gives her the (much-needed) reality check that that calms Kawashima down.  In one note-worthy moment, after seeing Yuzuhiko&#039;s charicature drawing of Kawashima (which turned out terrible), Kawashima gave up her feelings for him, but after Yuzuhiko&#039;s apology and explanation that he intended the doodle to be &quot;cute&quot;, Kawashima regained her feelings.  Aside from his nickname, Yuzupii, the &quot;Fan Club&quot; refer to him by the code name &quot;Hibari-chan&quot; (Little Skylark). This comes from a mass string of word association. (Tachibana Yuzuhiko [his name]--&gt;Yuzu Miso [a citrus-based condiment]--&gt;Miso [bean paste]--&gt;Misora Hibari [enka singer]--&gt;Hibari [Skylark].
  성우: Daisuke Sakaguchi


-제작진-

-제작사-: Shin-Ei Animation

Kazuto guesses that she is bringing home a man to have sex with. When his suspicions prove true, a new relationship between them begins.

Anime 262:
ID: 173533
제목 (Romaji): Monogatari Series: Off & Monster Season

From the past to the future, their story continues. 

Now that he has graduated from high school, Koyomi Araragi’s story ends here. His story is truly over now, but the stories of the girls Koyomi saved - their stories - are not over yet.

This is the prequel or sequel to their stories and their struggles.

(Source: Monogatari Series USA Official Website)
방영 시작일: 2024-7-6

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LfbSFeWG9NY
-등장인물-
  이름: Mayoi Hachikuji
  특징: Mayoi is a fifth-grade elementary school girl. She always carries a big backpack, wears a hairband, and sports ponytails.    ~!Ten years ago she was involved in a traffic accident and died because of it. After that she became a ghost and considers herself a "lost snail". She will unwillingly cause the people around her to become lost and unable to find their way home. The only people who can see her are people who don't want to go home in the first place. However, after [Araragi](https://anilist.co/character/22036/Koyomi-Araragi) and [Senjougahara](https://anilist.co/character/22037/Hitagi-Senjougahara) help her find the home she was looking for, she changed from an "earthbound spirit" to a "wandering spirit", a fact that she considers to be a bonus, as well as granting her to be free to wander wherever she desires. At the end of Nisemonogatari, she said goodbye to Koyomi, implying that she will not be seeing him again, which will be the basis of the next story, Mayoi Jiangshi. Her family name before her parents got divorced was Tsunade.!~
  성우: Emiri Katou

  이름: Yotsugi Ononoki
  특징: **Occupation:** Oddity Specialist

Yotsugi Ononoki is an expressionless human corpse tsukumogami and the shikigami familiar of [Yozuru Kagenui](https://anilist.co/character/57501/).

Despite appearing almost entirely stoic, she still has hinted at feeling genuine emotion. She's mentioned how she considers [Koyomi](https://anilist.co/character/22036/) her friend on multiple occasions, such as when giving him advice "as a friend" as opposed to as an oddity specialist. She's also expressed how she wouldn't want to have to harm him despite needing to follow orders as a shikigami.

She has an ability called Unlimited Rulebook which allows her finger to shape-shift and cause explosions. She also seems to have a type of super strength, being able to to carry Kagenui and others using only one finger.

She also has an appreciation for muscles.

(Source: Monogatari Fandom)
  성우: Saori Hayami

  이름: Nadeko Sengoku
  특징: __Height:__ 153 cm 

Nadeko, the main character of Nadeko Snake, is [Tsukihi](https://anilist.co/character/24195/Tsukihi-Araragi)’s friend back in elementary school. She always wears a waist pouch, always casts her eyes downward, has her bangs covering her eyes, has a shy personality, and can be easily amused. [Koyomi](https://anilist.co/character/22036/Koyomi-Araragi) played with her a lot whenever she visited his house after being invited by his sisters. She refers to Koyomi as Koyomi onii-chan and appears to have feelings for him.   ~!She was cursed two times by a classmate who liked the boy she rejected, and the rejected boy. While the first one is banished, Koyomi is forced to battle the second to keep it from killing Nadeko.!~ She's quite protective of her hair (particularly her forelocks) thinking that it's her place to guard more than her panties. When she finally combed her forelocks aside in Nisemonogatari, Koyomi commented that she has a glare just like a serpent, probably foreshadowing the story of Nadeko Medusa.

In Nademonogatari, ~!Nadeko gains a power to draw, create, and then materialize shikigami, making her useful in the eyes of [Izuko Gaen](https://anilist.co/character/87115/Izuko-Gaen) and gets offered a job, thanks to [Yotsugi Ononoki](https://anilist.co/character/57499/Yotsugi-Ononoki)!~
  성우: Kana Hanazawa

  이름: Tsukihi Araragi
  특징: __Height:__ 156 cm   

Tsukihi, the main character of Tsukihi Phoenix, is one of [Koyomi](https://anilist.co/character/22036/Koyomi-Araragi)'s sisters. She's the youngest of Araragi family. Unlike her sister, [Karen](https://anilist.co/character/24194/Karen-Araragi), she is always doing indoor activities. Contrary to her personality, she constantly changes her hair style and is short-tempered to the point that Koyomi describes her as having hysteria.    ~!She is actually the reincarnation of a phoenix and has been since before she was even born. The phoenix entered the baby's body when it was still in the womb and by now both beings' minds have become one. She is immortal and the only thing that end her life is a natural death from old age. It was hinted that [Kaiki](https://anilist.co/character/53641/Deishuu-Kaiki) was the one who sent [Kagenui](https://anilist.co/character/57501/Yozuru-Kagenui) and [Ononoki](https://anilist.co/character/57499/Yotsugi-Ononoki) to go after Tsukihi. Tsukihi and Karen are nicknamed Tsuga no Ki Nichū no Fire Sisters (栂の木二中のファイヤーシスターズ). It was revealed that the reason she and Karen found boyfriends was so that Koyomi would become jealous. They found boyfriends in Koyomi's image with Tsukihi's boyfriend being taller than her. She and Karen also thought that Koyomi's girlfriend was [Tsubasa](https://anilist.co/character/22055/Tsubasa-Hanekawa). Koyomi, Karen and Tsukihi's parents were revealed to be police officers. !~
  성우: Yuka Iguchi

  이름: Shinobu Oshino
  특징: A girl who lives with [Oshino Meme](https://anilist.co/character/22552/Meme-Oshino) in an abandoned building. She loves donuts from the Mister Donut chain. At the beginning of Hitagi Crab, she was renamed "Shinobu" by Meme, who suggested that the name Shinobu (忍), comprised of a heart (心) under a blade (刃), matched her original persona.

~!She appears to be an eight year old girl, but was originally a beautiful vampire who had lived for more than 500 years. After the events of Koyomi Vamp, she was left in a weakened condition with no powers or traces of her original personality, and therefore had to abandon her "Kiss-Shot Acerola-Orion Heart-Under-Blade" name. Prior to being a vampire, she was a princess of unparalleled beauty. She was referred to as "Princess Beauty" or "Acerola" during this time, the latter being her original name. Eventually, she was turned into a vampire by Deathtopia Virtuoso Suicide-Master to save her from the curse of beauty.!~
  성우: Maaya Sakamoto

 - 감독: Midori Yoshizawa 

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Akio Watanabe

Anime 264:
ID: 173584

Anime 265:
ID: 173639
제목 (Romaji): Ensemble Stars!!: Tsuioku Selection - Checkmate
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): あんさんぶるスターズ！！追憶セレクション「チェックメイト」
줄거리: New Ensemble Stars!! web animated series based on the game story "Checkmate".
방영 시작일: 2024-3-10
방영 종료일: 2024-3-15
방영 요일: 일요일
화수: 6화
러닝타임: 12분
장르: 음악
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx173639-tOigvTpDIVVM.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XhRN0BrKJl4
-등장인물-
  이름: Leo Tsukinaga
  특징: __Unit:__ Knights
__Club:__ Archery Club
__Circles:__ Dramatica, Overnight Outdoors

A popular composer who is showered in attention even from overseas. Leo is pure and unrestrained, but he cares deeply for his comrades and can sometimes be naive. His singing voice is as if it's playing and changes often, and his performances are overflowing with confidence.
A member of NEW DIMENSION’s Knights.

His eccentric and loud personality often confuses other people, as he doesn’t care about what is considered “childish” and indulges in any activity he might like, ultimately almost always acting on his own volition. Due to his free spirit, he even ends up skipping unit practice, causing Tsukasa to have to forcefully drag him to school.

Leo is a forgetful person, not remembering things he deems as unimportant and struggling to remember names as a whole. Although, despite his forgetful and seemingly clumsy personality, he is insightful and promptly knows when to give advice, as well as analytic and extremely aware about all details about the people he considers close, making him much more competent than he seems at first glance.
His personality underwent a deep change compared to his second year self, as he is not as naive and childish as before, and is now much harsher in his approaches. However, things such as his kindness remained as he is always wanting to help someone out, even if by questionable means. Leo still believes that holding grudges is a waste of time, and trying to keep a positive outlook on relationships.

He is impulsive in nature, and there are many times when he does not think things through before speaking, and unintentionally hurts the other person due to his eccentricity and spontaneity, as well as does things on a whim with no plans beforehand whatsoever. He goes to great lengths for inspiration, and can start composing a new piece anywhere any time, this is a habit that gains him lectures by Keito, since he ends up scribbling on the school’s walls with crayons without permission.

He doesn’t shy away from using somewhat hurtful means to achieve certain results, purposefully creating conflict to rile people up being the most common of them. However, in his heart, Leo is a truly kind and caring person, who wishes nothing more than the best for his friends and family, although not always being able to demonstrate it in a proper manner.


(Source: The English Ensemble Stars Wiki)
  성우: Shintarou Asanuma

  이름: Ritsu Sakuma
  특징: __Unit:__ Knights
__Club:__ Tea Club
__Circles:__ FLAVOR, CRAFTMONSTER

In the daytime it's hard to get his engine going, so Ritsu is often found napping in all sorts of places. He goes at his own pace and is relaxed, but can say some cutting things when he thinks quickly. His singing voice is like a sweet whisper, and his performances flow languidly.
A member of NEW DIMENSION’s Knights.

Though he may seem cold and uninterested, Ritsu is a playful and intelligent person at his core. Energy isn't something that comes naturally to him, and he is instead quietly passionate, and likes to tease others, enjoying their reactions.

At the start of the year, Ritsu tended to distance himself from his classmates and idol activities, which he viewed as laborious and boring because of the previous fractured state of knights. He was reluctant to make friends due to this (Mao also insinuates he has social anxiety issues). But as the year goes on, Ritsu begins to open up and form important bonds with his friends and unitmates. He is very loyal and affectionate to the select few he is truly comfortable with.

Ritsu can be blunt and harsh to a fault, but is very intuitive and often picks up on others' emotions. He regards psychoanalysis as a 'bad habit' of his, yet is very adept at it. At times, he be very clingy, and loves it when others praise him. He can be violent, especially towards his older brother, and doesn't hold his tongue often. Despite this, he can get very protective of his loved ones, to the point of being possessive.

Ritsu has abandonment issues largely stemming from Rei's absence last year, which contributes to his tendency of clinging to those he truly loves, yet also his habit of distancing himself from others as a whole. He shares Rei's aversion of sunlight, and becomes more active and 'alive' at night. They also share a habit of jokingly regarding themselves as older and wiser than their juniors.

He loves music, and plays the piano. His songwriting reveals a much deeper and more wistful side of him, something that he almost never reveals to others, preferring his smug and sleepy persona. Somewhat surprisingly, though, he tends to keep things to himself to avoid burdening others. As it stands, Ritsu values his unit and friends very much, and is willing to put effort into his idol work (or at least that which interests him).
  성우: Daiki Yamashita

  이름: Izumi Sena
  특징: __Unit:__ Knights
__Club:__ Tennis Club
__Circles:__ Niki's Kitchen, OCEANS

On top of his idol activities, Izumi engages in modelling in Europe. Stoic and high-strung, he also enjoys fussing over people who give him the chance to do so. He has a soulful singing voice and his performances are relaxed and beautiful.

He has a rude attitude towards most people he meets, being overly harsh in his criticisms and quick to point out their flaws. Despite this, he is quick to lend a helping hand to anyone who needs it, although begrudgingly. He never seems to ignore the struggles of other people, especially his underclassmen, who he wants to guide and take care of despite his harsh and grumpy personality. His harshness is often interlaced with an overbearing fussiness and perfectionism that renders him unable to sit back and watch while others fail.

Contrary to his claims, Izumi treasures his unit to an unimaginable extent, always working hard to make up for his wrongdoings during DDD and pushing himself to be better. 

(Source: Ensemble Stars!! Wiki)
  성우: Masami Itou

  이름: Arashi Narukami
  특징: __Unit:__ Knights
__Club:__ Track & Field Club
__Circles:__ Dramatica, Pretty 5

A self-proclaimed “big sister”. She is skilled at taking care of people and loves cute things. She has a friendly and sociable personality, but can occasionally have extreme mood swings. She has ample self-confidence when it comes to a refined performance and a light, gentle singing voice.
A member of NEW DIMENSION's Knights.

Arashi is a kind, determined individual with a playful streak. It is rare to see her raise her voice, and when she does, it is usually because someone she cares about is going through difficult times or is being mistreated. She has shown a fierce desire, time and time again, to protect everyone who is important to her, and this sometimes causes her to come off as overbearing or fussy despite also trying to be hands-off to keep the peace in some situations. She tries to solve her problems on her own without involving others even though she is often trying to help others herself, which can sometimes hurt her friends, as they may perceive her as being a stranger and not letting them know anything about her. Because she often refuses to accept help from others, when a situation becomes more stressful than she can handle, she may snap at those around her or push them even further away.

She is dedicated to the act of self-love, often declaring that she is the most beautiful and that no matter how others feel about her, she loves herself. This act may be used to cover her insecurities, but she wants those around her to see their strengths and love themselves as well. Though often seeming mature and capable, she possesses a childish side and loves competition, especially against fellow model Izumi. Due to how easily skills come to her, she adores people who work hard for what they have and always cheers on those around her in their endeavors. She has a sweet tooth and absolutely loves cake, but she tries not to eat too much of it due to worrying about its calorie content.

(Source: Ensemble Stars! Wikia)
  성우: Ryou Kitamura

  이름: Tsukasa Suou
  특징: __Unit:__ Knights
__Club:__ Archery Club
__Circles:__ BIBLION, Sweets Fan Club, Kaori

The son of a noble family, Tsukasa acts with a chivalrous spirit as his core, so he's more composed than others his age. While he's responsible and serious, he can also be childish and short-tempered. His singing voice is honest and direct, and his performances are powerful yet elegant.
Tsukasa is the leader of NEW DIMENSION's Knights.


While his gentlemanly manner attracts the ladies, he seems to be unaware of this and doesn't know much about the female mind. He has interest in the culture of commoners. His English pronunciation is smooth, which unfortunately only makes it hard to catch.
  성우: Reiou Tsuchida


-제작진-
 - 감독: Osamu Yamasaki 

 - 음악: Kenji Kawai 


-제작사-: Dandelion Animation Studio, Happy Elements

줄거리: Haruka has been living his high school life as a loner, but all of a sudden, he and his classmates are summoned into another world. A God gives him a list of skills he can freely pick... Or at least that was how it was supposed to be, as all the valuable skills have been taken by the other classmates first. After Haruka scolded God, he snapped back and gave all the remaining bad skills to Haruka. Thanks to the "Loner" skill, Haruka begins his lonely adventure in another world.

(Source: Muse Asia)

Failing to notice Haruka was missing, God decides to grant him all of the skills that were unchosen. 

One of the unchosen skills he receives is titled "Loner." The bearer of that title is not permitted to join a party.

He used this oppurtunity to form his "brilliant plan." His plan results in the death of all of the "delinquents," making 12 people he has killed. He ultimately loses to Haruka in the end.!~

~!Notable skills: Tweak and Copycat. Tweak allows slight manipulation of individual targets and Copycat allows the user to copy any skill and use it as efficiently as the original.!~

줄거리: A hard-working boy named Will enters a magic academy in hopes of becoming a great sorcerer. Unfortunately, there's a fatal flaw in his plan: he lacks the ability to use magic. He can't use a wand, but he can wield a sword in his battle to reach the top of a magic-dominated world. He just needs to believe in his own unique strengths and remember the promise he made with someone precious to him...

  특징: __Height:__ 177cm (5'9")

An ascendant who made it to the top of the Tower, earning the qualification to become Magia Vander, before being defeated by another candidate. He now works as a professor at Regarden Magical Academy, where he teaches Dark Magic and History and Origins of Magic. Ten years ago, he was one of a group of problem children who enlisted to fight in the Great War despite still being students.
  성우: Kouji Yusa

  이름: Colette Loire
  특징: __Race:__ Resans
__Height:__ 164cm (5'5")

Only daughter of house Loire, a fallen family of nobles. She specializes in earth magic, but struggles considerably with any spell requiring precision. Colette befriended Will following a certain incident during her first year at the academy.
  성우: Satomi Amano

  이름: Sion Ulster
  특징: __Height:__ 171cm (5'7")

Heir to house Ulster, a renowned line of fire mages. He has one younger sister. Following a certain incident during his first year at the academy, he became painfully aware of Will and began to see him as a rival.
  성우: Masaaki Mizunaka, Misato Matsuoka

Anime 286:
ID: 174634
제목 (Romaji): Sex ga Suki de Suki de Daisuki na Classmate no Anoko
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): セックスが好きで好きで大好きなクラスメイトのあの娘
줄거리: Episode 1 - 2: Sex ga Suki de Suki de Daisuki na Classmate no Anoko
Taichi Sano is short of money and, lured by the high hourly wage, applies for a part-time job as a camera assistant. While he is waiting at the location specified by the employer, his classmate Kanna Hiiragi appears. Kanna has a reputation of being the cutest girl in the school, and many boys confessed their feelings for her. Taichi also harbors a faint hope of dating her, so he hopes that this part-time job will be an opportunity to become closer to her. However, when Taichi finds out that the filming will be for an adult video, he tries to refuse, but Kanna accepts, saying that it will help her learn social studies. Taichi feels happy working part-time with Kanna. The part-time job is going well, although he is nervous about Kanna's occasional bold behavior. However, an accident occurs with the cameraman and actor, and Taichi has to suddenly take over. Kanna ends up doing the filming instead.

Episode 3 - 4: Hitori Ecchi:Onanie x2
Nitta is in love with Natsuki Amamori, who sits next to him. However, Natsuki is an honor student and Nitta is not good at studying, so there is no way they can be a match for each other, and she is a girl beyond his reach. What's more, Nitta has a hobby that he can't tell anyone about. He masturbates on Natsuki wherever he goes, even on school grounds. As he was thinking about Natsuki again today, he heard a noise. He peeked in that direction and found Natsuki masturbating. Nitta was transfixed by her. By chance, Natsuki found him. Seeing that she was about to cry after being seen in an embarrassing situation, Nitta confessed that he had been masturbating just a moment ago.

(Source: Getchu, translated)
방영 시작일: 2024-9-6

He is a member of Class 1-4 and a student of Sakuragaoka High School during the secondary cast's second year of high school. He is the younger brother of [Ken Shibasaki](https://anilist.co/character/134007/Ken-Shibasaki).
Aizo is an sociable character, chatty and friendly to everyone he meets. Public reports of his idol persona label him as very amiable and popular to approach. However, he's more prone to being irritated, making others butt out of his business by snapping at them, being more visibly angry with Yujiro, and preferring to be left alone. His language is rougher in his off-stage persona as well to reflect this.
  성우: 

  이름: Yuujirou Someya
  특징: Yuujirou Someya, also known by his stage name Yuujirou, is a character in the Confession Executive Committee song series, a primary character in the Idol Series, and a member of [LIP×LIP](https://anilist.co/staff/147796/LipxLip). He is a Sakuragaoka High School student in Class 1-4 during the secondary cast's second high school year.

Yujiro is fairly short for his age, and has short, dark blue hair with bangs cut in a diagonal, asymmetrical fashion and a few hairs sticking up, and matching blue eyes. Before he became a part of LIP×LIP, he had a bob haircut that came down to his mid-neck, and his bangs were blunted. He eventually cuts them into their iconic asymmetry when he becomes a teenager. Yujiro takes pride in the bangs, and finds them a charm point. Yujiro, for his public appearances, is described as "refreshing, kind, and cool". When it comes to socializing, he is polite and friendly to whoever he talks to, making them feel at ease. His behind-the-scenes persona is a much different character; he appears to be aloof and a bit hard to read, and can get rather open about his displeasure with certain subjects
  성우:

줄거리: The third season of the new 3DCG anime series for Koneko no Chii.
방영 시작일: 2024-7-19
방영 종료일: 2024-7-19
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 12화
러닝타임: 12분
장르: 코미디, 일상
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx175120-zzdJBduaJJHS.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-NqRlDb1r0
-등장인물-
  이름: Chi Yamada
  특징: Chi is just your average little mackerel-stripe kitten, who lost her mother and is taken in by the Yamada family. She is finding out about the world, the good (sushi) and the bad (the vet). In one of her little journeys, she meets a big cat, which becomes a sort of &quot;mom&quot; to Chi. Chi is very stubborn, and likes to play.  She&#039;s also very affectionate and loud, which is not good because cats are forbidden in the apartment complex where the Yamadas live.
  성우: Satomi Koorogi

  이름: Kento Yamada
  특징: The father of the Yamada family working as a graphic designer. He cares for Chi very much and frequently is buying toys and snacks, and worrying if she is lonely at home. He also is forced to do things like bring Chi to the vet or trim Chi&#039;s claws. As a result Chi sees him as the bad guy occasionally, but she gets over it relatively quickly.
  성우: Makoto Yasumura

  이름: Youhei Yamada
  특징: Youhei is a small boy that finds Chi in the park.  He &#039;comes up with&#039; the name Chi for the kitten.
  성우: Ryouko Shiraishi

  이름: Miwa Yamada
  특징: The mother of the Yamada family. She is a stay at home mom who cooks, cleans, and looks after her young son Youhei and Chi. She if frequently scolding Chi for making messes, and has to hide Chi&#039;s existence from the neighbors since pets are forbidden in the apartment complex.
  성우: Maaya Sakamoto

  이름: Kocchi
  특징: Although he's a little bit rough and acts like a boss, he is actually very gentle and shy. He cares about Chi and will often help her whenever she gets in trouble.
  성우: Motoko Kumai

 - 음악: Kenji Kondou 

 - 음악: Kei Kawano

Anime 299:
ID: 175138
제목 (Romaji): Nintama Rantarou: Dokutake Ninja-tai Saikyоu no Gunshi
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 劇場版 忍たま乱太郎 ドクタケ忍者隊最強の軍師
줄거리: No description available
방영 시작일: 2024-12-20
방영 종료일: 2024-12-20
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: 90분
장르: 코미디
성인등급: X
방영여부: NOT_YET_RELEASED
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx175138-SLaKyfkWnY0y.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=16w5v16KPJw
-등장인물-
  이름: Kirimaru Settsuno
  특징: __Class:__ 1st-year Ha-class
__Committee:__ Library
__Occupation:__ Student

Kirimaru is an orphan from an early age, and he doesn't have a surname. He is very street-wise and is always thinking of money and/or ways to get more. Doesn't take his studies as seriously as his part-time jobs, provoking his teachers' ire, but still likes being part of Ninjutsu Academy and being together with his friends. Currently lives with Hansuke Doi, his homeroom teacher.

He can be considered aloof at times, but takes his part-time jobs very seriously, oftentimes neglecting school work. His eyes turn into big gold coins whenever he hears the word "money", "treasure", "reward", "prize", etc. He is often looking for dropped coins on the road and loves to count his money whenever alone in his room which he shares with Rantarou and Shinbei. As shown whenever on errand jobs, he is good at handling kids, random pets, house chores and many other things. As a result of his stingy personality, he doesn't like being asked favors without compensation, but ends up doing them anyway.

Kirimaru has dark violet hair, with bangs parted down the middle and revealing a low widow's peak. He has hair tied into a tidy ponytail. Kirimaru has relatively sharp eyes, and has a unique charm point in his pointed tooth that appears when he is being mischievous.
  성우: Mayumi Tanaka

  이름: Rantarou Inadera
  특징: __Class:__ 1st-year Ha-class
__Committee:__ Health
__Occupation:__ Student 

Coming from a "common, nameless" ninja family, Rantarou is determined to become one of the best, elite ninjas. However, he often fools around with his two best friends Kirimaru and Shinbei and gets into trouble, often angering Doi-sensei and Yamada-sensei.

Rantarou has reddish, short and fluffy hair. He wears round glasses and has freckles on his cheek. In casual dress, he wears a green and light green spotted sleeves and blue-grey hakama.
  성우: Minami Takayama

  이름: Hansuke Doi
  특징: __Class:__ 1st-year Ha-class
__Committee:__ Explosives
__Occupation:__ Theory teacher, Advisor

A skilled and good-natured teacher, Doi is both strict and kind to his students. Despite his frequent stress-induced stomachaches caused by his class' poor academic standing, Doi remains persistent in trying to teach them, and believes in their practical abilities and individual talents. He is well-loved by his class, as well as the other nintama and staff of the Ninjutsu Academy. Outside of his job as a teacher, Doi works proficiently as a ninja. However, he is also shown frequently forgetting to pay his rent or attend town cleaning due to his busy life preparing make-up classes for the 1st-year Ha-class. He also shows a rather childish side when faced with his least favorite food.

Doi is of average build and height, with a slight baby-face. He has upturned eyes, a slightly pointed nose, and defined eyebrows. Notably, he has long, messy brown hair, but this is completely hidden when he wears his current ninja zukin or his casual hat, giving the illusion of short hair - usually, all that is visible is his characteristic bangs. In the past, this hair was tied in a messy ponytail.

~!Doi-sensei was brainwashed by Dokutake in the novel "Rakudai Ninja Rantarou: Dokutake Strongest Warrior," and had another persona known as Tenki. He eventually recovered his recollection and returned to his student. !~
  성우: Toshihiko Seki

  이름: Shinbei Fukutomi
  특징: __Class:__ 1st-year Ha-class
__Committee:__ Equipment
__Occupation:__ Student

Shinbei is relaxed, happy-go-lucky, and kind. He is a gourmand, and often hungry; he can easily be persuaded to act with the promise of food, similarly to how Kirimaru is driven by wealth. Shinbei is a lot slower than his friends in class and is supported often by Rantarou and Kirimaru, but he has occasional moments of brilliance where he says something smart or shows great physical strength.

The shortest of all the known nintama, Shinbei is stout and chubby; sometimes he is shown having an average physique when he is unwell. He has tidy, flowing hair tied into a short ponytail - his bangs are shown to be parted down the middle when he is not wearing his hood. He has super-thick eyebrows, dot-like eyes, and a wide mouth. When Shinbei runs out of hair conditioner, his hair turns incredibly hard and bristly, and stands on end (this also applies to his eyebrows on one occasion).

His casual wear consists of a periwinkle kimono with white polka dots and a wide red hakama that goes all the way down to his ankles (due to his short stature).
  성우: Teiyuu Ichiryuusai


-제작진-
 - 각본: Kazuhisa Sakaguchi 

 - 감독: Masaya Fujimori 

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Emiko Niiyama 

 - 음악: Kouji Makaino 


-제작사-: Ajiado, Shouchiku
