Anime 300:
ID: 175199
제목 (Romaji): Given: Umi e
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): ギヴン 海へ
줄거리: Sequel to Given: Hiiragi mix.
방영 시작일: 2024-9-20
방영 종료일: 2024-9-20
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: None분
장르: 드라마, 음악, 로맨스
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx175199-WxlBkrVGK8Fg.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s0Srq7l6kSM
-등장인물-
  이름: Mafuyu Satou
  특징: __Height:__ 173 cm

One of the protagonists of the manga-anime. He has a quiet, calm and mysterious personality, he can't express his thoughts and emotions very well, despite being a sincere boy. After all he is a strong person who has endured many bad things in his past. He lives with his mother (who works a lot and is never shown in the manga and anime) and his dog named Kedama, but he usually calls him Tama (cat name). His best friends in the past were Hiiragi, Yuuki (his ex-boyfriend) and Shizusumi (they were friends since childhood), his current best friends are Uenoyama (his current boyfriend), Kaji and Haruki, although he still maintains some contact with Hiiragi.
  성우: Shougo Yano

  이름: Haruki Nakayama
  특징: __Height:__ 178cm

Haruki Nakayama is a film major graduate student, and the bassist in the band Given. He is the oldest in the group and the leader of the band. Haruki “prefers lighter music (compared to other guys) and pop. Drawn to Japanese rock and light, slow tempo dance.”  He is “extremely good natured and kind” and is easily flustered. In the manga it is revealed that Haruki’s “stand” is a kind elderly man. He lives on his own in an apartment and is friends with Ritsuka Uenoyama, Mafuyu Satou, and Koji Yatake. 

~!In season one of the anime it is clear he has romantic feelings towards his band-mate Akihiko, and as of now in the manga is the boyfriend of Akihiko.!~
  성우: Masatomo Nakazawa

  이름: Hiiragi Kashima
  특징: __Height:__ 175 cm (5'9")

Hiiragi Kashima is a high school student who, along with Mafuyu, seems to know something about Mafuyu’s guitar. He is also Mafuyu's former classmate. He formerly played bass in a band with Yuki and Shizusumi.
  성우: Fumiya Imai

  이름: Ritsuka Uenoyama
  특징: __Height:__ 175cm (5′8")

Ritsuka Uenoyama is one of the main protagonists of the Given Series. He is a high school student and has a guitar prowess despite being just a high schooler. He is a considerate and compassionate guy and is also a genuine younger brother of his sister Yayoi. Uenoyama shows little consideration for small talk and can be quick to be irate. He can be smug when showing his high test scores, and says he can understand theory based subjects. Uenoyama can be very attentive to the feelings of others, particularly Mafuyu.
  성우: Yuuma Uchida

  이름: Akihiko Kaji
  특징: __Height:__ 184 cm

Akihiko Kaji is a college student in Given. Also the drummer in Ritsuka's band, he can play not only the drums but also violin, guitar, and bass.
  성우: Takuya Eguchi


-제작진-
 - 각본: Yuniko Ayana 

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Mina Oosawa 

 - 감독: Noriko Hashimoto

Anime 302:
ID: 175250
제목 (Romaji): Mugoku no Kuni no Alice
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 夢獄の国のアリス
줄거리: Based on the erotic doujin game by Tsukkii no Ochakai (つっきーのお茶会).

Alice is an ordinary girl who is a little timid and loves her big sister. When she finds herself separated from her sister in a strange room, Alice is in a lot of trouble. She is so lonely being in a strange place all by herself. "What should I do... onee-chan..." But Alice gathered up all her courage and tried her best to leave her room to look for her sister. But be careful. That room is very dangerous. It is full of strange and scary creatures and traps that can kill her. If she makes a mistake, she will never see her sister again. But if she doesn't have the courage to try, she won't be able to solve the mystery. Will Alice be able to find her sister safely? When she wakes up, there is a white rabbit... A white fluid was poured into her body.

(Source: Getchu, translated)
방영 시작일: 2024-5-31
방영 종료일: None-None-None

-등장인물-
  이름: Alice
  특징: She is pure and innocent and loves her older sister [Anya](https://anilist.co/character/337255). She is timid but she is also courageous for her sister's sake.
Her parents died when she was very young, and she was adopted by Anya's parents. Anya's parents later passed away, and she now lives with Anya. Alice does not know that she and Anya are step-sisters and thinks they are real sisters. Although their life is not prosperous, Alice feels happy with her sister.
A virgin. Ignorant of sexual matters.
  성우: Keiko Manaka

  이름: Anya
  특징: She is ladylike and quiet. She loves [Alice](https://anilist.co/character/337254) more than anyone else. She is not good with men. She doesn't like it when other girls approach her. She sneaks out when Alice is out and when Alice is sleeping in the middle of the night.
  성우: Ruri Hasumi

Anime 305:
ID: 175499
제목 (Romaji): Kyonyuu Onna Shikan Sennou Saimin
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 巨乳女士官・洗脳催眠
줄거리: Based on the erotic game by Lune.

Using a hypnosis device that he accidentally obtained, he corrupts the big-breasted female officers...! This assault reconnaissance ship Cheval has a secret... Aaron sniffs out rumors of [reducing the number of people] and accidentally discovers a [brainwashing hypnosis system] during his investigation. Knowing that people who are hooked on this hypnotic switch will listen to any commands, he brainwashes his female boss to find out the mystery, immerses her in pleasure, and tames her! The big-breasted female officers on the ship obey his command and perform forbidden personal training and guidance...!

(Source: lune-soft, translated)

An ace of military with high expectations who has begun to stand out as a genius pilot. She is strong and unyielding. While she is confident, she also works hard. Therefore, she is cold to people who do not make efforts or who do not live up to their expectations.
Coupled with her appearance, she is also an idol who is used by the military for advertising, and she does not find this special treatment to be unpleasant but rather, "It is natural for me"
  성우: Rose Fujiyoshi

  이름: Zenia Edwards
  특징: __Height:__ 162cm

Since her parents are soldiers, she is a soldier from the ground up. She is delighted to be faithful to her assigned duties and to achieve maximum results. Therefore, she is unforgiving to layabouts and those who interfere with orders.
She's not silent and stoic but she doesn't say anything extra and handles orders in a straightforward manner.
  성우: Ryouko Tezuka

  이름: Maria Lawrence
  특징: __Height:__ 164cm

A talented captain at a young age and bears the expectations of the military. She's kind, treats everyone equally and doesn't make anyone feel like they are beneath her elite status...
...On the surface. She never reveals her true face, but she is actually a ruthless commander. She views her subordinates as disposable and practices unreasonable strategies. So, except for some senior officials, everyone is completely deceived.

(Source: Anime News Network)

Anime 307:
ID: 175533
제목 (Romaji): The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors 2nd season
제목 (English): THE iDOLM@Ster SHINY COLORS Season 2
제목 (원문): アイドルマスター シャイニーカラーズ 2nd season
줄거리: The second season of The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors.
Note: The series is having a three-part theatrical pre-screening in Japan starting in July 2024. Regular TV broadcast begins in Fall 2024.
• Part 1 releasing theatrically on July 5, 2024.
• Part 2 releasing theatrically on August 23, 2024.
• Part 3 releasing theatrically on September 20, 2024.
방영 시작일: 2024-10-5
방영 종료일: 2024-12-21
방영 요일: 토요일
화수: 12화
러닝타임: 24분
장르: 음악
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영중
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx175533-p3Oq5xfbYycS.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-8_0tbVVeY8
-등장인물-
  이름: Fuyuko Mayuzumi
  특징: **Height:** 163 cm
**Hometown:** Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan

Fuyuko is a kind girl with a modest smile. Fuyuko is first seen as a bubbly and cheerful girl that likes cute things and is attentive to her surroundings. However, her true personality is much more serious, and she acts in a cutesy manner because she believes others will like her more when she does. The tone of her voice also changes from cute to serious between these personalities. She gets nervous easily and loses her temper when stressed, but doesn't want people to worry about her insecurities.
  성우: Eri Yukimura

  이름: Toru Asakura
  특징: __Height:__ 160 cm

A girl who doesn't put on appearances. Not worrying about how others view her, she is calm and goes at her own pace. However, she has an aura that attracts everyone in her despite her overflowingly transparent appearance. She is in her 2nd year of high school.

She has a serious and honest personality, but she also is rather easygoing and follows her whims. She expresses her feelings differently than most people, and can become disheartened when she feels like she can't connect or communicate with others. Therefore, it's hard to tell what she's thinking most of the time.
  성우: Yuu Wakui

  이름: Asahi Serizawa
  특징: **Height:** 153 cm
**Hometown:** Tokyo

Asahi is a middle schooler who loves looking for fun in every aspect of the world. She has an endless amount of natural talent for most anything she tries, and her genuine and innocently unique personality makes her fearless in the world of becoming an idol, as long as she's having a fun time.

Constantly searching for intriguing things, she is a strong, inquisitively spirited girl who never stands still. However, she can be straightforward when interested in something but can be easily bored sometimes.
  성우: Yuki Tanaka

  이름: Mano Sakuragi
  특징: __Height:__ 155 cm
__Hometown:__ Tokyo, Japan
__Hobbies:__ Going out, Sun basking in the park

Mano is a gentle girl who you want to protect. Her catchphrases are “Howa~” and “Mun!”. Mano has a kind personality and rarely gets angry or gives her opinion without being asked, but she has a tendency to saddle herself with worries in secret... Raised close to nature since she was young, Mano loves spending her time relaxing in the park. When Mano visits the park birds tend to gather around her and she often loses track of time playing with them. Mano loves birds and has a pet pigeon named Pii-chan. Mano also loves shopping and going on excursions. However, Mano has a slight aversion to large crowds since she often gets pushed around. Social interaction isn't Mano’s strong suit, and she was scouted by Producer while she was wondering whether she’d be alright staying her shy self forever. While usually not the type to take initiative on her own, after being offered several times Mano came to think being an idol “could be a chance to change herself” and decided to become an idol. Mano is a part of the unit “illumination STARS”. She has great respect for her unit-mate [Hiori’s](https://anilist.co/character/136822/Hiori-Kazano) solemn devotion to lessons and idol work as well as her unit-mate [Meguru's](https://anilist.co/character/136821/Meguru-Hachimiya) ability to make friends with anyone.

A soft-spoken shy girl with a kind, genuine personality. Mano's gentle demeanor can soften even the most hardened heart due to her kindness towards everyone she meets.
  성우: Hitomi Sekine

  이름: Mei Izumi
  특징: **Height:** 162 cm
**Hometown:** Saitama

An upbeat girl with an optimistic and broad attitude. While she has a hard time understanding more complex things, she's still easy to talk to. She is in her 3rd year of High School.

Initially, despite being very energetic and friendly towards everyone she meets, when she gets on stage in front of an audience her voice becomes small and she struggles to get words out due to a past event. In order to help Mei work around her stage fright, the producer suggests that she adopt a cool and mysterious image as her on-stage persona. This way, she won't need to worry about talking a lot or forcing herself to make her voice sound bubbly. Mei agrees, and after her first performance she thanks the producer for her new strategy which allows her to continue to pursue a life as an idol. In stark contrast to how Mei acts in everyday life, laughing often and comfortably making conversation with even strangers, her on-stage personality is terse, speaking few words with a steady and husky voice.
  성우: Sayaka Kitahara


-제작진-
 - 각본: Youichi Katou 

 - 감독: Mankyuu 

 - 감독: Takeshi Iwata 

 - 음악: Yasuhiro Misawa

Anime 308:
ID: 175573
제목 (Romaji): Gintama on Theater 2D: Ikkoku Keisei-hen
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 銀魂オンシアター2D 一国傾城篇
줄거리: Theatrical cut of the Courtesan of a Nation Arc (episodes 257-261). The movie is a part of the "Gintama 20th Anniversary Project".
방영 시작일: 2024-6-21
방영 종료일: 2024-6-21
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: None분
장르: 액션, 코미디, 드라마, SF
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx175573-jf4woESV4dx9.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vwgLPKI6sz0
-등장인물-
  이름: Gintoki Sakata
  특징: __Height:__ 177 cm  

A samurai living in an era where a samurai is no longer needed. To add to his troubles, oppressive aliens have moved in to invade. Gintoki lives with Kagura and Shinpachi, taking on odd jobs to make the world a better place...and to pay their rent. In the Joi war, he was known as the "White Devil" (Shiroyasha) due to his silver hair and white coat he wore in battle, which, combined with his impressive capabilities as a swordsman, made him famous among his comrades and struck fear into Amanto. Gintoki has naturally permed silver hair, which he blames for his lacking love-life. He has a big crush on the TV's news weather girl, Ketsuno. In fact, to date, the only time he is seen to have blushed is when he tries to make use of Sadaharu and Ketsuno's dog to get a chance to talk to her. Though several female characters have shown an interest in Gintoki, he usually does not show any response back and merely puts up with them as annoyances.  Gin has two major obsessions in life. He is obsessed with sweet foods such as parfait, ice cream, and cake. His second obsession is reading the manga anthology magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump. (Which, not coincidentally, is where Gintama is published in). His favorite type of milk is strawberry milk. Gin will go to great lengths to get the latest Jump issue, to the point of reckless behavior. His Jump obsession makes him easily dream of being like other Jump heroes, including wishing that he had a "Bankai" similar to the hero characters of Bleach. Despite his appearance and initial behavior, Gintoki has a great amount of pride for the old Bushido code. He takes it upon himself to rescue or avenge not only his comrades and friends but also people he barely got acquainted too, be it a pit-fighter who was taking care of abandoned orphans or an Amanto who resembles a kappa.   Despite being a fearsome fighter with nearly unmatched skills, he avoids needless bloodshed after suffering the loss of most of his friends and allies during the Joi war.

~!During the Shogun Assassination Arc, Gintoki's past is fully revealed, Alongside Takasugi and Katsura, he was taught at Shoka Sonjuku by Yoshida Shoyou. However Shoyou gets captured by the Tenshouin Naraku for abandoning them when he was still known as Utsuro and much later down the line in the Joui War Gintoki is captured along with Katsura and Takasugi, He has a choice to kill his teacher or his two friends. If he kills his teacher, they will be released; if he kills his friends, his teacher will be released; if he does nothing, everyone dies. Faced with an impossible decision, and not wanting to lose anyone he makes the impossible decision and takes Yoshida Shoyou's head.!~
  성우: Tomokazu Sugita

  이름: Maizou Rotten
  특징: Servant of the Tokugawa Family.   ~!He is later revealed to be Suzuran's lover.!~
  성우: Shigeru Chiba

  이름: Kagura
  특징: __Height:__ 155 cm

Although she appears to be a normal, cute, human girl in Chinese-style clothing, she actually belongs to the Yato Clan, one of the strongest and most bloodthirsty of the Amanto races. The Yato is said to have "transparent" skin that is highly sensitive to sunlight, so Kagura carries a purple parasol at all times. The parasol is also the Yato clan's weapon of choice; Kagura's is bulletproof and fires bullets from its tip. Because of her Yato blood, she is super-strong and can stop a speeding motor-scooter with one hand. Although stronger than most humans, she cannot control her strength perfectly. Her super-human strength makes her extremely bad with pets. Most of her pets, with the exception of Sadaharu, have met with an untimely demise at her hands.  She is also extremely flexible and fast; capable of catching multiple speeding bullets between her teeth and fingers. During a battle, she's often seen flipping through the air and performing various acrobatic feats. Due to her Yato blood, she is capable of rapid regeneration. During the Benizakura arc, she is seen healing from a gunshot wound almost overnight.  Kagura also has an unusually strong appetite. She is able to consume large quantities of food within a matter of seconds. Nevertheless, her tastes are endearingly plain. Sukonbu, rice, and eggs are among her favorite foods.  Her immediate family consists of her father, Umibouzu, a widely recognized alien hunter, her mother, who is deceased, and her older brother Kamui, once presumed missing who is now involved with the space pirates Harusame.  She came to Earth to earn money for her family. She found work fighting for a gang, but when they ordered her to kill her target, she ran away. Not long afterward, she met Gintoki and Shinpachi when Gintoki accidentally ran her down with his scooter. After they helped her to make a clean break from the gang, she intimidated Gintoki into hiring her. She now lives at the Yorozuya and sleeps in Gintoki's closet, like Doraemon.  Kagura and Gintoki share an odd father-daughter-like relationship. Together with Shinpachi, the three of them make for a strange, dysfunctional, yet tightly knit family. Kagura is very protective of Gintoki. Although, she herself has gotten into many fights with him, rarely does she let anyone else pick on him. She seems to trust wholeheartedly in Gintoki's ability and strength. Even in sticky situations, she has no doubt that Gin-chan would come to save her. She has a tendency to imitate Gintoki's bad habits, and would often quote the bad advice he gives her. Some of her lines start with "Gin-chan says..." or "Gin-chan told me..."  Kagura is also somewhat of a tomboy. She is often seen partaking in games with various neighborhood boys. Although her candid manner of speech often causes them to shun her, she doesn't seem to mind. In fact, she has no problem at all with forcing her way into their game. In battle, she has proven to be bull-headed and a sore loser. Like Gintoki, and probably because of his influence, she is not above resorting to petty tricks and manipulation to get the better of her adversary. Unlike many conventional manga heroines, she doesn't display the same consciousness toward decorum, table manners, ​and physical appearance. Puking, cussing, picking her nose, spitting, fighting, and scratching herself is common behavior for Kagura.  She regards Okita, captain of the Shinsengumi, as a rival. She detests him, and appeared to be disgusted when she previously mentioned (about Okita), that "he definitely likes me", but as that hasn't been brought up since, it is uncertain if it should be considered canon, that he apparently likes her.  According to the OVA, Kagura is the first and only Weekly Shonen Jump girl to vomit on-screen. To date, she has induced herself to vomit on several occasions. She also has an uncanny knack for seeming calm or detached during high-tension situations; in episode 5, she slept through a car-chase. Her appetite knows no bounds, and she is especially fond of sukonbu.  In Japanese, Kagura speaks in a stereotypical dialect that is associated with Chinese immigrants. In the English-translated manga, she punctuates her sentences with yup, uh-huh, nope, and the like.   ~!In the Yoshiwara in Flames arc, Kagura meets her older brother, Kamui who abandoned her because she was weak in his eyes.!~ In the last Gintama character popularity poll, she came in 6th place.
  성우: Rie Kugimiya

  이름: Suzuran
  특징: Being the highest ranking courtesan of Yoshiwara, she excels in singing and dancing and no one in Yoshiwara can rival her in any of the arts.
  성우: Teiyuu Ichiryuusai

  이름: Shinpachi Shimura
  특징: __Height:__ 166 cm

Shinpachi Shimura works under Gintoki to learn the ways of the samurai. He used to stay at his family's dōjo. However, it seems more like he's just trying to help Gintoki pay the rent than to learn. Shinpachi is the captain of the "Otsu's Imperial Guard," a pop singer's fan club.  Shinpachi meets Gintoki after Shinpachi was tripped by the ambassador of Planet Chatoran. Gintoki beats up the ambassador and his guards, not to stand up for Shinpachi, but to get revenge for his spilled parfait. Gintoki frames Shinpachi for the crime, which somehow led to him saving Shimura Tae (Otae), Shinpachi's sister, from becoming part of a brothel.  Despite his meek appearance, Shinpachi is a more than competent swordsman of his family's Kakidō-Ryu, the type of swordsmanship his dojo teaches.  In the character popularity poll, he was in 8th place.  His name is roughly based on Shinsengumi member Nagakura Shinpachi and comedian Ken Shimura.
  성우: Daisuke Sakaguchi


-제작진-
 - 감독: Youichi Fujita 

 - 각본: Akatsuki Yamatoya 

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Shinji Takeuchi 

 - 각본: Michiko Yokote 

 - 작화감독: Shinji Takeuchi 

 - 각본: Kento Shimoyama 


-제작사-: Bandai Namco Pictures

Anime 309:
ID: 175642
제목 (Romaji): SAND LAND: THE SERIES
제목 (English): Sand Land: The Series
제목 (원문): SAND LAND: THE SERIES
줄거리: In the far future, war has destroyed the entire Earth, leaving only a barren wasteland where the supply of water is controlled by the greedy king. In search of a long-lost lake, Sheriff Rao asked the king of the demons for help...and got the king's son, Beelzebub, and his assistant, Thief. Together the unlikely trio sets off across the desert, facing dragons, bandits and the deadliest foe of all... the King's army itself! 
The first half of the SAND LAND: THE SERIES anime, episodes one to six, are titled “Akuma no Ooji” and is based on the film adaptation with some new footage, it will premiere alongside episode seven, which is the first episode of a brand-new arc titled “Tenshi no Yuusha”.

  이름: Beelzebub
  특징: The main protagonist, Beelzebub is the son of [Lucifer](https://anilist.co/character/331389) and thus the "Prince of the Underworld", he is usually referred to only as "Prince" by his fellow demons. Beelzebub (named after the biblical demon of the same name) lives in relative harmony with the humans. Although he regularly steals water from them, he only takes as much as he and his fellow demons need to survive. Joining [Sheriff Rao](https://anilist.co/character/13698) in his journey to give him something to do, Beelzebub lends his enhanced sight and demonic strength to fight against the king.
  성우: Mutsumi Tamura

  이름: Thief
  특징: An expert at stealing and one of the wisest of demons, Thief is recruited by Beelzebub to accompany them in searching for water. He gains an affection for driving during their quest, and often fights with Beelzebub for turns driving their tank
  성우: Choo

  이름: Rao
  특징: An elderly man, Rao seeks to free the people of Sand Land from the king's pocket.
~!
Formerly known as General Shiba, Rao disappeared after his forces died years earlier trying to destroy a weapon on the king's orders. As he travels with Beelzebub and Thief, he learns that the weapon was actually meant to produce water. Regretting what he was tricked into doing, Rao sets out bring down the king and help those whose family died due to his actions.!~
  성우: Kazuhiro Yamaji

Anime 313:
ID: 175977
제목 (Romaji): Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan
제목 (English): My Deer Friend Nokotan
제목 (원문): しかのこのこのここしたんたん
줄거리: Koshi Torako has everyone fooled. Her classmates see her as the perfect honor student, unaware of her secret delinquent past. But her new picturesque school life is thrown into chaos when she bumps into Shikanoko Noko, a girl with antlers! Mayhem seems to follow this strange doe-eyed girl. Who, or what, is she?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
Note: Each episode streamed 4 days early on some streaming services. The original TV broadcast started on July 7th, 2024.
방영 시작일: 2024-7-3
방영 종료일: 2024-9-18
방영 요일: 수요일
화수: 12화
러닝타임: 23분

키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx175977-Pgrtv3p3ROe9.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kgM53bfd_L0
-등장인물-
  이름: Narrator
  특징: This character page is set to represent and list all narrators, which haven't been given a visual representation of themselves in their respective work. 

Please add other narrator characters, which were given a visual representation of themselves, separately from this narrator page.
  성우: Kousuke Toriumi

  이름: Noko Shikanoko
  특징: __Grade:__ 3rd Year
__Positions:__ Founder, Mascot, and Official Deer of the Deer Club, Part-Time Deer at Hino Zoo.

Noko Shikanoko is a unique human-deer hybrid and the founder and mascot of the Deer Club at Hino Minami High School.

She is a transfer student who becomes the best friend, classmate, and clubmate of [Torako Koshi](https://anilist.co/character/330137/Torako-Koshi).
  성우: Megumi Han

  이름: Torako Koshi
  특징: __Grade:__ 3rd Year (Formerly 2nd Year)
__Positions:__ President of the Deer Club, Head of the Student Council, Delinquent Gang Member (Formerly)
  성우: Saki Fujita

  이름: Anko Koshi
  특징: __Grade:__ 1st Year
__Position:__ "Self-Proclaimed Sister Caretaker" of the Deer Club

Anko is a new student at Hino Minami High School, the 3rd official member of the Deer Club, and the younger sister of [Torako Koshi](https://anilist.co/character/330137/Torako-Koshi). She is best known for her sister complex towards their older sibling; being highly obsessed with everything regarding her sister and making it her personal life goal to be always by her sister's side 24/7, much to the latter's dismay and embarrassment. She will not hesitate to try and outright assassinate anyone who goes as far as to even just stand within near proximity of Koshitan, typically having a dark and sinister aura whenever somebody starts to act all chummy with them. Anko is also known to be adept at arming herself with her collection of kunai when faced with possible "threats" and in setting traps in her victims' surroundings. 

The only time she has made an exception to anyone else getting close to her sister was when she tried killing [Noko Shikanoko](https://anilist.co/character/330136/Noko-Shikanoko), only to see, much to her surprise, that her sister deeply cares for Nokotan. Thus, she decided that someone else, for once, was also worthy of supporting Koshitan as well, just as long as it was together.
  성우: Rui Tanabe

  이름: Meme Bashame
  특징: __Grade:__ 1st Year
__Position:__ "Deer-In-Training" of the Deer Club

Meme Bashame is a new student at Hino Minami High School and the 4th official member of the Deer Club. Bashame joined the Deer Club because of her newfound idolization of [Noko Shikanoko](https://anilist.co/character/330136/Noko-Shikanoko), who had offered Bashame kindness and deer crackers: saving Bashame from starving on their first day of high school. Bashame hopes of learning to become a full-fledged deer during her stay in the deer club under Nokotan, viewing her as a sensei of sorts and having somewhat of a passive obsession over them.

Bashame can be described as laidback and sluggish, having no problem falling asleep anywhere and everywhere at anytime, usually ending up dozing on the cold concrete floor. Bashame miraculously never gets sick from this. Bashame also is notable for having illeism, a tendency to refer to oneself in third person when speaking, and a fascination with rice, as Bashame often cooks, eats, and grows rice in the Deer Club, more times being seen with rice than not. This could be from Bashame's passion for self-sufficiency, or Bashame may just really love rice. Bashame also tends to eat this rice excessively, many times being seen with a towering amount of rice in a bowl, much to the shock of other characters. Bashame also cannot whistle.
  성우: Fuuka Izumi


-제작진-

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Ayumu Tsujimura

  이름: Shin Ichijou

Shin Ichijou is a young man who enrolls at Edel Rose because he wants to become a Prism Star like [Hiro Hayami](https://anilist.co/character/126908/). He is a genuine boy with a shining disposition and is always cheerful and optimistic.

(Source: Official Site)
  성우: Junta Terashima

  이름: Kazuki Nishina
  특징: __Height:__ 162 cm (5'4")

Kazuki Nishina is one of the love interests in Pretty Rhythm: Rainbow Live. He is the childhood friend of [Kouji Mihama](https://anilist.co/character/126906/), [Ann Fukuhara](https://anilist.co/character/80427/), and [Wakana Morizono](https://anilist.co/character/80435/), although he doesn't remember her very well. He is part of a street-dancing group, and is the son of a family of sign-artists.

~!After resolving his differences with [Hiro](https://anilist.co/character/126908/), the three of them form the unit Over The Rainbow and have their debut concert at the end of Pretty Rhythm: Rainbow Live. Ann and Wakana confessed to him at the same time but he never gave them an answer, collapsing from embarrassment every time the topic is brought up.
!~

In King of Prism

Known as the Street-style charisma. Became a Prism Star because of his admiration towards former street-style prism star [Rei Kurokawa](https://anilist.co/character/135087/).
He is a very caring and reliable upperclassman for his juniors. Straightforward and has a warm heart.
  성우: Toshiki Masuda

  이름: Louis Kisaragi
  특징: __Height:__ 172 cm (5'8")

Louis Kisaragi is a mysterious pretty boy. He leads [Shin](https://anilist.co/character/126905/) into Prism Shows.

~!He was originally a prism messenger as part of the Rinne/Shine Program in his past life. Prism messengers part of the Rinne program were meant to help female prism stars while Shine was meant to help male prism stars. Shine ended up breaking the rules of the prism messengers by performing in public himself, and the Prism G.O.Ds tasked Rinne to kill Shine. Rinne went against orders and sealed Shine away with a prism jump because she was in love with him. After this, Rinne began exhibiting errors causing the Prism G.O.Ds to erase her data.

Rinne was eventually reprogrammed as a new program, "Louis". After being reborn as Louis, he was tasked again by the Prism Gods to kill Shine, who now resides in Shin. However, Louis retains memories of his past life and refuses to kill him. He eventually realizes that he doesn't love Shin because Shine lives within him, but because he grew to love him after spending time with him.!~
  성우: Shouta Aoi

  특징: __Height:__ 185 cm (6'1")

Anime 320:
ID: 176287
제목 (Romaji): Hanma Baki VS Kengan Ashura
제목 (English): Baki Hanma VS Kengan Ashura
제목 (원문): 範馬刃牙VSケンガンアシュラ
줄거리: Who will be crowned victorious in the ultimate fight between the strongest high schooler on earth and the successor of the Niko Style?
(Source: Netflix Anime)
방영 시작일: 2024-6-6
방영 종료일: 2024-6-6
방영 요일: 목요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: 60분
장르: 액션, 스포츠
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx176287-evl3ehXyZ80q.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-zXiDV8uNnI
-등장인물-
  이름: Ohma Tokita
  특징: Having grown up in the lawless territory known as The Inside, the young Ohma was found and adopted by Tokita Niko, who taught him his style of martial arts; the Niko Style. Ohma is a man of above-average height and has an extremely athletic build. His most notable trait is his mop of messy, dark hair that has been compared to seaweed. In addition, Ohma possesses a narrow gaze that exudes both confidence and general indifference.

Ohma is a rough, yet well-meaning individual. He was initially rather arrogant, which often surfaced whenever he fought. During his fights, he was condescending and often belittled and provoked his opponents. A defining trait of Ohma is his lust for battle; ever eager to fight against those who are strong. Despite this love for fighting, he will not fight those that refuse to fight him. Such was the case when Kazuo and his son had done so on separate occasions. That being said, he was also short-tempered and can be quite violent. He was willing to physically assault Hideki Nogi, his employer, when the latter refused to make him Nogi Group's representative fighter, before being stopped by Sen Hatsumi.
  성우: Tatsuhisa Suzuki

  이름: Baki Hanma
  특징: Baki Hanma (範馬 刃牙, Hanma Baki) is the main character and protagonist of the Baki the Grappler franchise. He is the son of Yujiro Hanma and Emi Akezawa. ~!Baki is also the half-brother of Jack Hanma.!~

~!The main character, and son of Yujiro Hanma. He has been training in martial arts since the age of three, and has trained under various teachers and coaches throughout his life. At the age of thirteen, he decided to take his training into his own hands and left the coaches to perform more intense training in his father's footsteps. He later meets with his father and becomes disillusioned as to his father's true character, and afterwards, aims to defeat and kill him. His fighting style is called "Total Fighting" and includes techniques from many different martial arts. He fights Arudi Regan in round 1, Zool in round 2, Igari Kanji in round 3, and Retsu Kaioh in round 4 before facing his brother in round 5 which are the finals of the tournament. He eventually develops the ogre/demon face on his back when fighting his brother, but manages to suppress it. Unlike Yujiro, he chooses to control his killing intent and fight his battles fair and honorably no matter what the outcome.Many of Baki's unusual training methods often earn him the admiration of many of the fighters of the underground arena for example Shadowboxing, or visualizing fighting an opponent, is a big part of Baki's regimen sometimes his visions take an almost corporeal form and given he can easily remember and replicate any technique he sees this gives him a huge edge over his opponents as he can fight them and learn their weakness before actually fighting them. Baki has encounters with all the escaped convicts in the "Search of Our Strongest Hero" series, has just defeated Biscuit Oliva, and is now faced with a new challenge against the prehistoric man Pickle. He is currently waiting for his fight with Pickle after Retsu and Katsumi are defeated. He had a shadow boxing visualization fight with a T-Rex prior to the Katsumi/Pickle fight. He has been recently defeated by Pickle in the Korakuen area.!~

~!During Chapter 312 of Hanma Baki, Baki makes Yujiro forfeit his title of the "Strongest Creature Alive" after making him concede in their fight!~
  성우: Nobunaga Shimazaki

  이름: Saw Paing Yoroizuka
  특징: Saw Paing is a Burmese fighter with a lean and tall physique. He arguably appears much younger than he is, with a youthful and hairless face and spiky, voluminous brown hair and hazel eyes. True to his personality, he often sports a determined and enthusiastic expression with wide eyes and a perpetual grin.

Saw Paing is the polar opposite of his self-proclaimed rival, <a href="https://anilist.co/character/143861/Gaolang-Wongsawat">Gaolan Wongsawat</a> while the latter is calm and apathetic, Saw Paing is hot-blooded, brash, and easily excitable. He is a frequent shouter and yells loud enough to drown out the announcer on the mic in a crowded stadium. His adoptive father, Sanemitsu, casually states that Saw Paing is not a very intelligent person, though he does have (a certain degree of) common sense. Despite his hot-blooded nature, Saw Paing is surprisingly understanding, such as delaying fights with Gaolan if the latter has an appointment.

His rivalry with Gaolan is seemingly one-sided; after Kaolan beat him in a cross-border match at age 16, he frequently sneaks across the border to challenge him to a rematch, even climbing up Kaolan's high-rise apartment to do so, much to the latter's annoyance.
  성우: Nobuyuki Hiyama

  이름: Raian Kure
  특징: Raian Kure is an assassin from the infamous Kure Clan. He represented Under Mount, Inc. as their affiliated fighter during the Kengan Annihilation Tournament.
Two years later, he fought in the Kengan Association VS Purgatory Tournament, representing the Kengan Association.
  성우: Yoshitsugu Matsuoka

  이름: Kaoru Hanayama
  특징: Fifteen-year-old yakuza leader and strongman. When his father died, he was adopted by his uncle who saw great potential in him. His grip is so strong that if he grabs an opponent's arm, he can usually cause it to explode from restricting the blood flow. He is also a street fighter and it is unknown if he has trained in martial art styles. He broke Yuri Chakosky's arm, thus ending his boxing career, but when then cross paths again they hold no grudge against each other understanding each other's warrior spirit. (Source: Wikipedia)
  성우: Takuya Eguchi


-제작진-
 - 감독: Toshiki Hirano 

 - 각본: Atsuo Ishino 


-제작사-: Netflix, TMS Entertainment

Anime 323:

제목 (Romaji): Ojamajo Doremi 1620's

-등장인물-
  이름: Doremi Harukaze
  특징: Self-proclaimed as the "unluckiest pretty girl in the world", Doremi inherits the traits of every main character: clumsy and ditzy, but with a compassion for others. Doremi is the girl who first becomes a witch, and at first, her magic only got her into trouble. One important fact about Doremi is that she has an obsession with steak. However, her hopes of getting one are extremely slim. In each season, she has an open chance to get a steak, but she'd turn it down in some way. Frankly, Doremi's first magic spell was attempting to conjure up one, but it failed.  Doremi has no real love interest, except she has affection for Kotake Tetsuya and Akatsuki of the FLAT4.  Her family consists of her parents, Keisuke and Haruka, and her younger sister, Poppu.
  성우: 

  이름: Hana Makihatayama
  특징: She first appears in Sharp as a baby born from a rose in the Majokai. Doremi and her friends are then assigned to raise her for a whole year. 
Hana-chan always speaks in third person and refers to her mothers without any honorifics. Later in the series Jou-sama gives Hana-chan a magic tap of her own so she is also a witch but of pure blood.
  성우: 

  이름: Momoko Asuka
  특징: Momoko, or Momo-chan, is actually from America. She appears quite late in the series, at the start of the third season, Motto. Momoko is sent by Jou-sama to help Doremi and her friends to bake sweets. She is always loud and hyper, and sometimes blunt. She is closest friends with Doremi.  When she was eight, she became a witch under the apprenticeship of Majomonroe. When Majomonroe fell sick and passed away, Momoko used the forbidden magic to attempt to revive her. Even though it didn't work, she lost her witch powers. Now she is given a second chance.  One important fact about Momoko is that in Motto, she only knew how to speak English. (Only when she was a witch could she speak Japanese.) By Dokkan, her friends had thought her to speak the language, but Momoko would sometimes comment with English words. (Like, "Wow!")  Momoko has no real love interest.  Momoko's birthday is May 6, her favorite color is yellow, and her instrument is the guitar. Her family consists of her parents.
  성우: 

  이름: Onpu Segawa
  특징: Onpu appears in the second half of the first season. She is a child idol, being a singer, an actress, and having her own morning radio show. Hence, she has a large male fanbase who will chase her anywhere. She is also a witch, but was once under the apprenticeship of Majorika's rival, Majoruka.   One important fact about Onpu is that at first she comes off as a selfish and spoiled brat. She then reformed her ways and joined Doremi and co.  Onpu has no real love interest, but she shows affection for Tooru of the FLAT4.  Onpu's birthday is March 3, her favorite color is purple, and her instrument is the flute. Her family consists of her parents.
  성우: 

  이름: Aiko Senoo
  특징: Aiko, or Ai-chan, first appears as a transfer student from Osaka, which shows from her Osaka accent. Like a typical Osakan, Aiko is also very humorous and often cracks jokes. She's the smart aleck type of the group.   One important fact about Aiko is that she has a passion for sports, and is very athletic. She seems to fare better than her classmates and thus makes her popular in the sports department. The only sport she is weak at is swimming.  Aiko has no real love interest, but she shows affection for Leon of the FLAT4.   Aiko's birthday is November 14, her favorite color is blue, and her instrument is the harmonica. Her family consists of her divorced parents, Koji and Atsuko, and Aiko wishes one day for them to be together again.
  성우:

Anime 324:
ID: 176311
제목 (Romaji): Ao no Exorcist: Yuki no Hate-hen
제목 (English): Blue Exorcist -Beyond the Snow Saga-
제목 (원문): 青の祓魔師 雪ノ果篇
줄거리: Sequel to Ao no Exorcist: Shimane Illuminati-hen. 

Uncover the dark side of the Knights of the True Cross and the mystery of the "Blue Night"!

Brothers Rin and Yukio head to Lake Towada in Aomori to search for Shura, who had suddenly disappeared. There, they find Shura’s birthplace – the place where Shiro became her guardian. As their search continues, Rin and Yukio discover the fate that awaits Shura.

Meanwhile, Lightning, one of the Arch Knights, arrives at the Japan Branch of the Knights of the True Cross and begins his investigation into the Illuminati. Lightning deduces that everything began on the “Blue Night,” as he gradually steps into the dark side of the Knights of the True Cross….

(Source: Aniplex USA)
방영 시작일: 2024-10-6
방영 종료일: 2024-12-22
방영 요일: 일요일
화수: 12화

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=idfqKTtEmF4
-등장인물-
  이름: Rin Okumura
  특징: __Height:__ 173 cm (5'8")

The fifteen-year-old protagonist of the story, Rin is the son of Satan born from a human woman and is the inheritor of Satan's powers. His powers were sealed at birth into the demon-slaying blade Kurikara, or Koumaken, by Mephisto Pheles, allowing him to live a normal human life for about 15 years.

(Sources: Viz, Blue Exorcist volume one manga extras)
  성우: Nobuhiko Okamoto

  이름: Yukio Okumura
  특징: __Height:__ 180 cm (5' 11") 

Yukio is Rin Okumura's twin and younger brother and Shiro Fujimoto's adopted son. He is a Middle First Class Exorcist who has started his training to become an Exorcist at seven by his father suggestion and, since then, gained the titles of Dragoon and Doctor at only fourteen, becoming the youngest Exorcist in the True Cross Order history. Yukio is also the youngest teacher of the True Cross' Exorcist Cram School, at which he teaches pharmacology. Before he was born, he has had a weak body that couldn't bear the power of the blue flames, causing the power of Satan to be fully inherited by Rin. He is seen as an ​example and prodigy by the ones who live together with him and is friends with Shiemi Moriyama, who calls him Yuki-chan.
  성우: Jun Fukuyama

  이름: Kuro
  특징: A two-tailed cat demon (nekomata).  Formerly Fujimoto's familiar but is now Rin's familiar.  Kuro is a Cat Sith who was once worshipped as a protective deity for silkworms.  He usually takes the appearance of a kitten, but he can reach an enormous size at will.
  성우: Ayahi Takagaki

  이름: Renzou Shima
  특징: __Height:__ 176 cm

Renzou is a very carefree character, yet he has a fear of many things, mainly bugs. He's very loyal to Bon, his childhood friend. They grew up together along with Konekomaru in Kyoto. He is also has a big obsession with women. Plans to become a Meister in Aria He is the 5th and youngest son of his family, and tells Konekomaru he's glad of this because it means he has less responsibilities. His older brother Juuzou says he's the pervert out of the brothers. He has pink (dyed) hair. It is naturally black. In the manga, Renzou wears a man-tailored (flannel sort of) shirt over a t-shirt with a symbol, sort of like a bulls-eye. Renzou also carries around K'rik (Khakkhara) staff, which he and his two brothers also have. Renzou is a carefree character and was the first person to actually befriend Rin since the revealing of the blue flames, which shows Renzou is the friendly-type. He is also afraid of bugs, yet he is known as the pervert out of the Shima brothers. Renzou was born into the temple that Bon and Konekumaru was in as well, making him the childhood friend of the two.
  성우: Kouji Yusa

  이름: Izumo Kamiki
  특징: __Height:__ 164 cm

Izumo Kamiki is a top student at the Exorcism Cram School of True Cross Academy who comes from a long line of shrine maidens.
  성우: Eri Kitamura

Trailer: N/A
-등장인물-
  이름: Vijay Singh
  특징: __Height:__ 185 cm
__X-Playing Card:__ Green Green (♣ 3)

Vijay Kumar Singh is a member of High Card. He has a calm personality, loves plants, and is a great chef. Though he is an intelligent man that can complete any task flawlessly, his rationality prevents him from being able to “read the room,” so the others think of him as a bit of an “airhead.” He is a part-time lecturer and a Ph.D. student at the University of Cribbage. 

He oversees systems management and sales at Pinochle’s Old Maid branch.
  성우: 

  이름: Finn Oldman
  특징: __Height:__ 176 cm
__X-Playing Card:__ Neo New Nambu (♠ 2)

Finn is a recently scouted member of High Card. He is a mischievous, spirited, and reckless young man. Born with nerves of steel, Finn is able to maintain his cool disposition in even the most nerve-racking situations. Having lost his family in a tragic accident at a young age, Finn spent a majority of his formative years living in the Sun Fields orphanage. His sharp focus allows him to lock on his targets, as if time has stopped. This talent allows him to be an excellent pickpocket. 

Finn is now working as a sales apprentice at Pinochle's Old Maid branch.
  성우: 

  이름: Wendy Satou
  특징: __Height:__ 165 cm
__X-Playing Card:__ Love & Peace (♠ A)

Wendy is a member of High Card, becoming a member of the society through the connections she had from her father, a master swordsman. She is often serious and is therefore frustrated by the way [Finn](https://anilist.co/character/281395) and [Chris](https://anilist.co/character/281394) work. She enjoys eating and drinking more than any of the other High Card members. When she drinks, her mood improves, and her coldness is replaced by a sunnier disposition. 

She is part of the accounting and clerical staff at Pinochle’s Old Maid branch.
  성우: 

  이름: Leo Pinochle
  특징: __Height:__ 164 cm
__X-Playing Card:__ Never No Dollars (♦ 7)

Son of [Theodore Constantine Pinochle](https://anilist.co/character/281399), manager of Pinochle’s Old Maid branch, and the leader of the High Card society. Possessing a king’s temperament, Leo is sharp tongued, sadistic, and unable to admit to his faults. Despite his abrasive nature and young age, people acknowledge that his refined tactics are unmatched. 

He attends the public school, Rummy College, where he has an entourage. He loves to spend money.
  성우: 

  이름: Chris Redgrave
  특징: __Height:__ 182 cm
__X-Playing Card:__ Calorieʼs High (♥ 5)

Chris Redgrave is a member of High Card. He is a flirty, street-smart man who knows his way around women. He is able to operate any vehicle, including cars, with his unmatched driving skills. He has got a sweet tooth and eats “Fudgees”, which are sticks of traditional confectionery fudge. He drinks but has a low alcohol tolerance. 

He is a sales representative at Pinochleʼs Old Maid branch and becomes [Finnʼs](https://anilist.co/character/281395/Finn-Oldman) mentor.
  성우: 


-제작진-

Anime 334:
ID: 176529
제목 (Romaji): WcDonalds
제목 (English): WcDonald's
제목 (원문): ワクドナルド
줄거리: McDonald’s has partnered with legendary animation house Studio Pierrot to produce the first official WcDonald’s anime. Four episodic shorts will take fans into the flavourful world of WcDonald’s, where a story about the WcDonald’s Sauce and WcNuggets unfolds each week, The shorts will honor four of anime's biggest genres - Action, Romance, Mecha, and Fantasy. 

Episodes:
1) The Race to WcDonald’s: WcDonald’s Sauce has arrived, marking the moment everyone has eagerly anticipated. The announcement excites fans across the land, sparking an all-out, action-filled race between two strangers to be the first to experience this long-awaited delicacy. Find out who comes out on top in the race to WcDonald’s. 

2) Love from Across the Booth: Our two protagonists discover the WcDonald’s Sauce and WcNuggets aren’t the only perfect pairing. Just one glance… and just one dip… that’s all it takes for love to unfold. Kazuki and Shizuru must face their feelings in the second installment of WcDonald’s!
 
3) WcNuggets Space Frontier 3000: On the Moon-Base WcDonald's, a space monster suddenly disrupts the balance with a growing hunger for WcNuggets. Assemble! The crew at the Moon-Base WcDonald’s is ready for action boarding the famous mecha WcDizer 3000. But can they keep the sauce safe from the Wakudon’s attack and tip the scales against this Class A monster? 

4) The Wisdom of the Sauce: During the final week of WcDonald’s Sauce, three friends meet to savor this occasion one last time, wishing this flavor never had to disappear. And that wish might just be granted as they’re transported to a distant, magical land, where they are challenged to seek the wisdom of the sage Kenja and keep the WcDonald’s Sauce. Will our heroes triumph in their quest?

(Source: WcDonald's, Press Release, edited)

Anime 338:
ID: 176663
제목 (Romaji): Girls und Panzer: Taichou War!
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): ガールズ&パンツァー タイチョウ・ウォー！
줄거리: OVA included in the Blu-ray/DVD release of the fourth Girls und Panzer das Finale film. 
방영 시작일: 2024-3-27
방영 종료일: 2024-3-27
방영 요일: 수요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: 10분
장르: 코미디
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx176663-HhhpS7kGw6gT.png
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EA-oCV27WAc
-등장인물-
  이름: Miho Nishizumi
  특징: **Height:** 158 cm (5'2")
**Home Town:** Kumamoto City, Kunamoto Prefecture

She was born into the distinguished family of the Nishizumi Style of Sensha-do, but she changed schools to Ooarai Girls Academy intending to run away from Sensha-do.   However, perplexingly enough, she was extorted into joining Sensha-do by the student council. She's a second-year and considers her friend's feelings more than anyone else. She has traumatic memory of tanks because of an incident that happened during her past with a tank. She's Ankou Team's Commander and is Ooarai's De Facto captain.   

Miho has a polite personality and can lack self-confidence when in social situations. However when in a Sensha-do battle, Miho is known for her quick and decisive thinking. Miho also has a deep sense of loyalty to her friends, being ready to sacrifice her own reputation for the sake of others. Finally, Miho is a fan of the teddy bear brand Boko, having a large collection of the bandaged/beat-up bears in both her apartment and her old room back home.
  성우: Mai Fuchigami

  이름: Darjeeling
  특징: One of the "Noble Sisters" from St. Gloriana's Girls Academy. She is a third year. Her role is a commander in the Churchill tank. As the commanding officer at St. Gloriana, she leads the entire Panzer team. Her characteristic is the way she speaks in a high-handed manner. She is calm, chivalrous, and maintains her composure in and out of the field. Her motto is "No matter how fast we go, or no matter how many hits we take, I will never spill my tea." She is seen most of the time drinking Darjeeling tea.
  성우: Eri Kitamura

  이름: Momo Kawashima
  특징: **Height:** 164 cm (5'5")
**Home Town:** Mito, Ibaraki Prefecture

Momo is a third year student from Ooarai Girls High School. She's also the PR manager of her school's student council. She started as the gunner and loader of Turtle Team, and when its Panzer 38(t) was converted into a Hetzer she took her definitive position of loader. Although she looks composed and calm girl, she loses her temper easily and when she's angry and shooting at the same time. Her devotion to the school, and her desire to save it by winning no matter what, had likely brought her to be so vehement. She hates being called "Momo-chan." Momo has 5 younger siblings: four sisters and one brother. 
~!In Das Finale, everyone in Ooarai then learns that Momo's failed her University Admissions Test because she was busy looking for new tanks for Ooarai for the Winter Continuous Track Cup. Momo intends to make Ooarai as one of the cornerstones of the Sensha-dō league, which would prevent any attempt at closing the school in the future. Moved by Momo's effort, all teams then agree to make Momo the Commander so that upon winning the Continuous Cup, she will be able to take AO entrance exams to get into Shimofusadai National University. To accomplish this, Miho Nishizumi also has taken the role of Vice-Commander.!~
~!Also in Das Finale, it is revealed that Momo was responsible for saving several delinquent students from the Naval Studies Department of Ooarai Girls Academy (who eventually become Shark Team) from expulsion.!~

(Source: Wikipedia, Girls und Panzer Wiki)
  성우: Kana Ueda

  이름: Kay
  특징: **Height:** 158 cm (5'2")
**Home Town:** Sasebo, Nagasaki Prefecture

The energetic leader of the Saunders Sensha-dou team, portrayed as a stereotypical American, who is loud, boisterous, charismatic, and laid back. She believes that Sensha-dou is not war and believes in fair play.
  성우: Ayako Kawasumi

  이름: Chiyomi Anzai
  특징: **Height:** 156 cm (5'1")
**Home Town:** Toyota, Aichi Prefecture

"Duce" Anchovy is Anzio's overall commander, who uses a Carro Armato P 40 heavy tank. She wears the uniform of the Black Shirts, similar to that of Benito Mussolini. Anchovy is a self-confident, hot-blooded, sometimes even cruel leader, seeing every Sensha-dō battle as personal duel between the leaders. Due to this attitude she even tends to insult enemies before the match, calling them weak and cowardly. However, she also cares about her subordinates and is a capable tactician.
  성우: Maya Yoshioka


-제작진-
 - 각본: Reiko Yoshida 

 - 감독: Takahiko Usui 

 - 작화감독: Isao Sugimoto 

 - 캐릭터 디자인: Isao Sugimoto 


-제작사-: Actas

Anime 340:
ID: 176907
제목 (Romaji): Ito wo Yoru
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 糸を撚る
줄거리: Episode 1

Katatsumuri
A track-and-field girl waits for the bus alone at a bus stop in the middle of nowhere where it rains frequently. Then a climate otaku boy appeared. The two are soaking wet and talking as comfortably as if they were taking a break. While their abnormal sexual tendencies come and go, they respond to the otaku boy's desires and accept each other's desires. Under the sky after the rain, the men and women's feelings were different, but their satisfaction levels overlapped, and there were two people who were lost in thought.

Episode 2

Ame no Yo ni
On a rainy night when a middle aged man was desperate, a woman at a girls' bar named Aine approached him and he entered the bar, and then he started going to the bar several times. About a month later, he met a drunken Aine at a standing bar in the daytime. When he asked her about it, she told him that she was unemployed. After listening to her complaints for a long time and caring for her, they were alone together in a park restroom.

Natsu
The school pool was covered with the summer sun. As a boy is cleaning it, a female student, the class president, comes to help him. When they are almost finished, the girl slips and gets drenched in the pool water. He took her hand and helped her up. She says she has something she wants to try... and the two spend a summer of youth.

(Source: Mediabank, translated)
방영 시작일: 2024-7-19
방영 종료일: None-None-None
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: None화
러닝타임: 20분
장르: 야애니
성인등급: O

Anime 341:
ID: 176909
제목 (Romaji): Yozakura-san Chi no Mini Sakusen
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 夜桜さんちのミニ作戦
줄거리: Mini anime shorts of Yozakura-san Chi no Daisakusen.
방영 시작일: 2024-4-11
방영 종료일: 2024-10-10
방영 요일: 목요일
화수: 27화
러닝타임: None분
장르: 코미디
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx176909-7e9gNUUJzTbw.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGqdcd00pAM
-등장인물-
  이름: Taiyou Asano
  특징: __Affiliation:__ Yozakura Family, Asano Family
__Occupation:__ Student, Spy
~!__Blooming:__  Hardening!~

Taiyou is the main protagonist of the series. He is a Spy and member of the Yozakura Family. Taiyou married into the Yozakura Family for the sake of wanting to protect Mutsumi Yozakura and also find out the truth of what happened the day of the car accident which took his parents' and younger brother's lives.

Taiyou was a cheerful person before he went through the experience of his entire family's death in a car accident. It was after that day that his personality and made him afraid of forming emotional connections with anyone. The only person who he stayed close with was [Mutsumi Yozakura](https://anilist.co/character/162724/Mutsumi-Yozakura) because of her promise to never leave him.

~!Mutsumi shared her Yozakura blood power with him, granting Taiyou supernatural abilities and the Blooming.!~
  성우: Reiji Kawashima

  이름: Nanao Yozakura
  특징: __Affiliation:__ Yozakura Family
__Occupation:__ Student, Spy
~!__Blooming:__  Adaptation!~


Nanao is one of the main supporting characters and younger son in the Yozakura Family.

He is the sweet and gentle (but enormous) youngest brother, adept at creating drugs and medicine of all kinds. Hides his face with a bucket.

~! It is later revealed that he uses medicine to shrink his body so he can look like a normal student and go to school to try and live a normal life. !~
  성우: Yumi Uchiyama

  이름: Mutsumi Yozakura
  특징: __Affiliation:__ Yozakura Family
__Occupation:__ Student, Spy, Head of Yozakura Family

Mutsumi is one of the main protagonists of the series. She is the wife of [Taiyo Asano](https://anilist.co/character/162723/Taiyou-Asano) and the current head of the Yozakura Family.

Mutsumi is a kind and caring girl who can be willing to do anything to help her friends and family. Additionally, she is responsible as a sister and as the Head of the Yozakura Family, taking after her late mother, the previous head of the family. Since being married to Taiyo Asano, she's seen assisting in Taiyo's missions, leading him the way, treating his wounds, etc. Mutsumi also does not hesitate when it comes to Taiyo and her family despite always being targeted by other spies and assassins.

Since being born as a normal child of the Yozakura Family, making her the Head of the family, she is not known to have any superhuman abilities or skills. Even so, Mutsumi still, does have the talent and knowledge of a spy apart of the Yozakura Family.
  성우: Kaede Hondo

  이름: Shinzo Yozakura
  특징: __Affiliation:__ Yozakura Family
__Occupation:__ Spy (Gold Rank)
~!__Blooming:__  Destroy!~

The constantly jittery third child of the family, specialized in firearms. He often hides in a trash can.

Shinzo is a scaredy-cat, and he also has a rather low self-esteem despite his strength when serious. Shinzo always has one of his guns on him, even when he was a child. Without his weapons of choice, Shinzo seems useless and cowards in fear and distress. He gives off a different, more serious vibe as if he is focused on something important when armed. However, despite these weaknesses, Shinzo wants to live up to the expectations others set up for him and will try his hardest with every task.
  성우: Kazuyuki Okitsu

  이름: Kengo Yozakura
  특징: __Affiliation:__ Yozakura Family
__Occupation:__ Spy
~!__Blooming:__  Assimilate!~
The cheerfully mischievous fifth child of the family, who can craft hyperrealistic disguises.
  성우: Yoshitsugu Matsuoka


-제작진-

-제작사-: DLE, NBCUniversal Entertainment Japan

Undeterred, he uses his silver tongue to gather allies, develop cunning strategies, and form the greatest clan around. Now, as the most notorious Talker, Noel will do whatever it takes to claim supremacy.

Anime 353:
ID: 177191
제목 (Romaji): Go-toubun no Hanayome *
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): 五等分の花嫁＊
줄거리: The honeymoon of Futaro and the five sisters has been adapted to film under the original idea and complete supervision of Negi Haruba. Once again, we present a romantic comedy with 500% cuteness!
(Source: Official 5th Anniversary Project Website, Translated)
Note: The anime was pre-screened in Japan theatrically for 3 weeks starting on September 20, 2024 before being aired as a TV special.
방영 시작일: 2024-9-20
방영 종료일: 2024-9-20
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: None화
러닝타임: None분
장르: 코미디, 드라마, 로맨스
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx177191-ovNZsq8EbIPY.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mbz6LljqeH4
-등장인물-
  이름: Miku Nakano
  특징: __Height:__ 159 cm (5'2")

Third sister of the Nakano Quintuplets. She is a silent and reserved girl. Miku tends to have a pessimistic attitude and little confidence regarding herself. Due to [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063)'s influence, she's the first among the sisters who open up to him.

Miku likes Japanese History (especially Generals from Sengoku Period) and greatly influenced by their philosophies, to the point of affecting her real-life behavior.

(三) means three.
(玖) means black jewel.
  성우: Miku Itou

  이름: Fuutarou Uesugi
  특징: __Height:__ 178 cm  (5'10'')

Fuutarou is the main protagonist of the 5-toubun no Hanayome series.

He is a student of the Asahiyama High School. He lives with his father, Isanari Uesugi, and younger sister, Raiha Uesugi, in a small apartment. He is a serious and hardworking high school student and a prodigy at the top of his grade. Because of his family's perpetual poverty, he takes up the offer to tutor the Nakano quintuplets.

Fuutarou is noted to have a big ego and high confidence. He is straightforward, tactless, and rude; but is actually capable of holding back his emotions. Despite that, Fuutarou could momentarily lose his composure when agitated and faced with unfavorable circumstances. He also initially did not like getting involved with other people's problems, finding them to be troublesome. Despite his tactlessness and crudeness, he is knowledgeable enough in knowing what to say in specific situations when thrown at him; rarely giving up when trying to achieve a specific objective.

Despite his egotistical nature, Fuutarou is very hardworking and has a very high amount of patience; especially when getting the attention of the quintuplets and tutoring them despite various amounts of failures and setbacks. He later on shows a sense of duty strong enough to help the quintuplets in their studies despite them not paying him immediately, even though the money that came with tutoring was the initial reason he accepted the job. He also begins valuing their relationship to the point where he would do things outside of their tutor-student relationship which would later on bloom into a bond where they mutually support each other with little question.
  성우: Yoshitsugu Matsuoka

  이름: Yotsuba Nakano
  특징: **Height:** 159 cm (5'2")

She is the fourth sister of the Nakano Quintuplets, and one of the main characters of the Quintessential Quintuplets series. Having a cheerful and energetic personality, she has a strong tendency of helping people out. Yotsuba is an active and easygoing girl. She is a type of person who can't say no to people who need help. She is also very physically fit, and is capable of tasks that her sisters can not do. She has excellent endurance and is great at sports. She's the only sister with excellent eyesight. She has a good sense of smell and a green thumb. Though she's great at physical activities, she has the lowest score out of all of her sisters.

Yotsuba is the only sister who accepts [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063) since the beginning and wholeheartedly supports him in everything. 

(四) means four.
(葉) means leaf.
  성우: Ayane Sakura

  이름: Ichika Nakano
  특징: __Height__: 159 cm (5'2")

First sister of the Nakano Quintuplets. Despite the negligible age difference among them, she took the role of the eldest sister properly. She is also trusted enough to act as their confidant and leader. Ichika aspires to become an actress. She likes to tease [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063).

(一) means one.
(花) means flower, blossom.
  성우: Kana Hanazawa

  이름: Nino Nakano
  특징: **Height:** 159 cm (5'2")

Second sister of the Nakano quintuplets. She usually acts as the mother of the family, she cooks for them and takes care of their medical needs. Among the five sisters, she is the one who has the highest hostility towards [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063) and often rebels against him.

Nino has a sharp tongue and talks bluntly when confronting the others, even if the other party is her sister. She has an outgoing attitude and is socially aware, resulting in her having many friends. She is a scheming person and doesn't hesitate to use underhanded methods to achieve her goals.

(二) means two.
(乃) means from.
  성우: Ayana Taketatsu

Anime 358:
ID: 177456
제목 (Romaji): The IDOLM@STER Million Live! OVA
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): アイドルマスター ミリオンライブ！ 新作アニメ
줄거리: A new episode included in volume 3 of the Blu-ray release depicting behind-the-scenes footage of the opening performance
방영 시작일: 2024-3-29
방영 종료일: 2024-3-29
방영 요일: 금요일
화수: 1화
러닝타임: 21분
장르: 음악, 일상
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx177456-ieR3QOAISTSN.jpg
Trailer: N/A
-등장인물-
  이름: Mirai Kasuga
  특징: **Hometown:** Tokyo
**Height:** 156 cm

Full of energy, and a tad bit dense, Mirai is the center of MILLIONSTARS, taking a similar role to Haruka in the original iDOLM@STER series.

She's not a smart girl, as she tends to forget to do her homework, she didn't know who Oda Nobunaga (one of the most, if not the most famous warlord in wartime Japan) was, and she always speaks before thinking. She also seems to be a terrible cook since her homemade special drink caused the Producer to make a really scary face.

Her path to become an idol started when her friend took her to a live idol concert (in the manga, it is Shizuka who she met and the concert in question was 765PRO’s theater show, which Shizuka is also part of) and she became so impressed that she instantly quit her club to become an idol. She is also a rather innocent girl who is embarrassed to be in a swimsuit, and isn't sure whether her feelings for the Producer are love or just respect.
  성우: 

  이름: Shizuka Mogami
  특징: **Hometown:** Saitama Prefecture
**Height:** 162 cm

At first glance, one might think that she's a stoic loner because of her harsh words towards the Producer (“I don't have the time!”, ”A producer like this is better than none I guess”). Although, in truth, she is still childish, somewhat hot-blooded, and really cares for her friends.

The reason she acts harsh towards the Producer is because her distrust of adults (she sees them as selfish and she thinks that they always look down on children). This may have been caused by her overly strict father, who attempted to dictate his only daughter's life, until they got into a fight for said reason (as hinted in the game and in the theater section of THE IDOLM@STER MILLION RADIO!). The official manga confirms that he only let her become an idol after she begged him to let her, but only after giving her an ultimatum: she has one year to become a successful idol, otherwise he'll bar her from idol activities. That's part of the reason that she's so no-nonsense about being an idol. However, if you can prove that you're trustworthy, she'll start to open up to you (in a "tsun" manner).
  성우: 

  이름: Elena Shimabara
  특징: __Hometown:__ Brazil
__Height:__ 160 cm

Elena is a half Japanese-Brazilian girl who lived in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil before moving to Japan at the age of 6. This has not only allowed her to speak a little bit of Brazilian-Portuguese, but also to speak a bit of Japanese, too. Although she lived in Brazil for only 6 years, Elena has a great love for football and carnivals. She also wants to perform samba, regardless of place and time.

Elena is very energetic and friendly, but she's not good with formalities. She's also kindhearted and cares for her friends, especially Kotoha and Megumi.
  성우: 

  이름: Hinata Kinoshita
  특징: **Hometown:** Hokkaido
**Height:** 146 cm

From a family of farmers who left her hometown in Hokkaido for Tokyo after being scouted as an Idol, Hinata is a kind, honest, and quite mature girl with an innocent heart, who speaks in a heavy northern dialect. Always places her trust in others even if they're lying, and doesn’t mind if she's lost, as long as she can do her best and have fun with everyone.

She tends to doubt herself and gets nervous before lives, but always does her best so that she can make her family proud. Hinata knows that she's considerably average but is determined not to run away and wants to work as hard as she can. She's fond of cute things, such as stuffed bears and cats, and likes to collect them. She gets worried she'll be judged for liking things that are "too young" for her, but is reassured that it's cute to be interested in them.

She is very close with her family and misses them a lot while she's in Tokyo doing idol work. However, Hinata has grown to love all of the members of the theater and thinks of them as another big family.
  성우: 

  이름: Reika Kitakami
  특징: **Hometown:** Nagano
**Height:** 164 cm

Her personality can only described as free-spirited and childish. She often comes up with weird ideas like giving the Producer a dried fish flavoured chocolate on Valentine's Day, because it's also Dried Fish Day in Japan. She praises the Producer in ways that are hard to take as compliments. For example, she called the Producer a normal person who looks a bit unreliable, but she truly meant it as compliment, since it makes her feel more comfortable around him.

She often takes actions that surprise others, such as choosing a plastic trumpet as a Christmas gift for her parents, mistaking a deer for a bird, or using a dishwashing gel to clean the bathroom. Nevertheless, she always means well. In short, she's a kind-hearted person who loves to see people smile, but possesses a unique way of viewing the world that can be hard for others to understand.
  성우: 


-제작진-

-제작사-: Shirogumi, Bandai Namco Entertainment

Anime 359:
ID: 177581
제목 (Romaji): Kinokoinu
제목 (English): Kinokoinu Mushroom Pup
제목 (원문): きのこいぬ
줄거리: Picture book author Hotaru Yuuyami lost his beloved dog, Hanako. He was in the depths of a dark and deep sadness, regretting his inability to do anything about it. One day, he notices a pink mushroom growing under the snow willow tree in his garden. As he gazed at it idly, it suddenly began to move, wagging its tail and coming closer to him. “A mushroom...dog?”

Despite his doubts, he decides to live with this mysterious creature, “Kinokoinu" (Mushroom Dog). Then he started drawing where he wasn't supposed to draw, ate all the melon bread and takoyaki, and made all sorts of messes, but his playful attitude is hard to hate.

The days spent with Kinokoinu, involving his childhood friend Komako-chan, the editor, and Yara-kun of the Mushroom Research Institute, gradually changes Hotaru's expression. This is a slightly mysterious and heartwarming animation that depicts the funny days of Hotaru and everyone together with Kinokoinu, who is too mysterious in many ways.
(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)
방영 시작일: 2024-10-3
방영 종료일: 2024-12-19
방영 요일: 목요일
화수: 12화
러닝타임: 24분
장르: 코미디, 드라마, 판타지, 일상

방영여부: 방영중
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx177581-IiMPlgRFwktk.jpg

  이름: Heshikiri Hasebe
  특징: An uchigatana made by Hasebe Kunishige. The origin of him name comes from when Nobunaga cut through a cabinet along with the servant hidden in it.   이름: Mikazuki Munechika
  특징: Mikazuki Munechika is a tachi sword and is one of the five great swords of Japan, and he is also said to be the most beautiful. He was born near the end of the 11th century. Thus, getting the nickname "jijii."

(Source: Touken Ranbu Wikia)
  성우: 

  이름: Shokudaikiri Mitsutada
  특징: A sword made by Mitsutada, who is said to be the true founder of the Bizen Osafune swordsmithing school. His name originates from when Date Masamune killed one of his retainers and also managed to cut down a candlestand at the same time. He's a stylish person who fusses over his appearance.
  성우: Takuya Satou

But as they grow up, they face existential questions, learning adulthood’s complexities and that the true threat may not be from above.

  이름: Kadode Koyama
  특징: A girl in her third year of high school. She loves the iconic manga character Isobeyan. She also has a crush on her teacher.
Her dad went missing during the initial appearance of the alien mothership over Japan. She appears to have a rocky relationship with her mother, who's constantly worried about her own health and the A-Rays that were released when the aliens invaded.

  특징: He was a member of an idol group and also acted in some movies. He disappeared during the event of 8/31. When she was younger, Kadode was obsessed with him.

~!His body was taken over by an invader child during the 8/31 event and ever since he has been living as an invader in the human body.!~
  성우: Miyu Irino

  이름: Ouran Nakagawa
  특징: A girl in her third year of high school. She is Kadode's best friend.

She has long black hair, which she often wears in twintails, secured by skull-shaped hairties. Ouran has an older brother, who is a NEET. She likes to play video games along with Kadode.

Ouran is a very flamboyant character. She often rambles on about her goal to enslave mankind or lead the human race to destruction. However, despite her seemingly flamboyant and sociable personality, Ouran tends to only show her true self to her friends and family.
  성우: ano

  이름: Rin Hirama
  특징: Kadode and Ontan's friend. She is a quiet girl who is into boy's love. She is Ai's childhood friend.
  성우: Saeko Ouki

  이름: Makoto Tainuma
  특징: A classmate of Futaba's from middle school. He likes to wear women's clothing as he simply wishes to be cute and beautiful.
  성우: Ryouko Shiraishi

Anime 374:
ID: 178396
제목 (Romaji): NIJIYON ANIMATION 2: Shinsaku Animation
제목 (English): None
제목 (원문): にじよん あにめーしょん2 新作アニメーション
줄거리: Unaired episodes 13-15, included in the NIJIYON ANIMATION 2 Blu-ray box.
방영 시작일: 2024-6-26
방영 종료일: 2024-6-26
방영 요일: 수요일
화수: 3화
러닝타임: 4분
장르: 코미디, 음악, 일상
성인등급: X
방영여부: 방영종료
키 비주얼 URL: https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/media/anime/cover/medium/bx178396-yroCk9l4pCmY.jpg
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CPLcOBQoJ0o
-등장인물-
  이름: Ayumu Uehara
  특징: __Height:__ 159 cm (5'2")

Ayumu Uehara is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a member of A・ZU・NA, a unit under Nijigaku. She is a second year student and her image color is light pink. 

She is hard working and believes that trying your best is the only thing to do. She is kind, sociable and wants everyone to succeed. Ayumu can also be rather clumsy at times.
  성우: Aguri Onishi

  이름: Ai Miyashita
  특징: __Height:__ 163 cm (5'4")
__Favorite food:__ Nukazuke

Ai Miyashita is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a member of DiverDiva, a unit under Nijigaku. Her image color is ultra orange. 

Ai has a "gyaru" sense of fashion, paired with a big heart and the will to help anyone with their problems. This makes her very popular at school and also as an idol. She is most commonly seen with Rina Tennoji, another member of the club whom she helps face and overcome her shy nature.
  성우: Natsumi Murakami

  이름: Lanzhu Zhong
  특징: __Height:__ 165 cm (5'5")

Lanzhu Zhong is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a member of R3BIRTH, a unit under Nijigaku. She is a second year student and her image color is rose gold. She recently transferred from Hong Kong and is fluent in both Mandarin and Cantonese.

Despite showing herself as a charismatic girl, her unique personality tends to catch others off guard by how demanding she can be with them so that they achieve excellent results like her, which leads her to make questionable decisions and to treat people in a way that usually makes them feel insulted. Even so, she doesn't hesitate to seek every possible way to befriend others.
  성우: Akina Homoto

  이름: Setsuna Yuki
  특징: __Height:__ 154 cm (5'0")

Setsuna Yuki is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She was the leader and founder of the original group and is a member of A・ZU・NA, a subunit under Nijigaku. She is a second year student and her color is scarlet red. The name "Setsuna Yuki" came from the characters of a light novel that she read.

Setsuna is passionate and headstrong, but kind and mature. She has a habit of taking on too much work and not wanting to burden friends with her problems. Setsuna has an unwavering passion for school idols and her raw emotion combined with a powerful voice is her charm point. She is the student council president of Nijigasaki High School.
  성우: Coco Hayashi

  이름: Mia Taylor
  특징: __Height:__ 156 cm (5'1")

Mia Taylor is one of thirteen members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a member of  R3BIRTH, a unit under Nijigaku. She is third year student and her image color is platinum silver. She recently transferred from New York and is fluent in both English and Japanese. 

Despite coming from a family of esteemed musicians, Mia would much rather prefer the life of a homebody and eat nothing but burgers. Mia is considered a 'music prodigy' by Lanzhu; she was an American college student before immediately transferring into Nijigasaki as a third year due to her skills, despite only being 14 years old.
  성우: Shuu Uchida


-제작진-

-제작사-: Sunrise, Bandai Namco Filmworks, KADOKAWA
